story:
Summary

Last year I produced a book of pro-independence comic strips called 'Greg Moodie Versus The Union' ("brilliant" - Nicola Sturgeon). Since the referendum, I've drawn two strips a week - one online at Bella Caledonia and one in Scotland's newest daily paper, The National. Now I've gathered these post-indyref toons together to form a new book, 'Greg Moodie's Election Dissection'. It's a record of the buildup to this year's General Election, albeit one created by someone with issues.

The Big Election

'Greg Moodie's Election Dissection' is a 136-page colour-explosion in a large-format 297 x 297 cm (roughly 12" x 12"). It has a gloss laminated soft cover, matt coated art paper within and a specially written foreword by Lesley Riddoch. Anyone contributing during this 3-week period will receive a signed and numbered first edition copy. 

All your favourites are here - Rockstar Sturgeon, Glue-Sniffing Jim Murphy, Deputy Dugdale, Margaret Curran In Space, Spider John McTernan, Eddie Bear and Corky, The Fluffy Bunny, The Cardboard Cutout Scottish Secretary, Nosferatu Giddy Osborne, Tennents Special David Cameron, Piggybacking-LibDems, UKIP Trolls, plus hats and moustaches that move in mysterious ways.

There are four levels of perks. The Tache-Lite is the downloadable book in pdf format. The Main Election is the signed and numbered first edition. The Rockstartastic is the signed, numbered first edition along with five exclusive, signed A4 art prints. The Full Dissection is the signed, numbered first edition, the art prints plus a brand new Greg Moodie Badge Collection. (See gallery images.)

What Is Needed

The book will be printed in Scotland by Bell & Bain Ltd, who previously took such loving care over 'Greg Moodie Versus The Union'. Funds of £7500 are needed to cover this cost, along with postage and packaging.

Scottish Satire

If ever there was a time for satire in Scotland, it's now. Westminster politics is undergoing a major and long-overdue shakeup and it's largely being driven by the people of Scotland and events taking place here and now. This book takes a cuttingly satirical view on how these events have been unfolding and pinpoints the key players in ways that hopefully make them uncomfortable.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know you're mostly slackers and deviants so there's no point pretending that you're too busy to help spread the word about the Fluffy Bunny publishing event of the decade. I'd appreciate it if you could take two minutes out from your heavy loafing schedule to share this on Facebook and Twitter, and I hear that Google + is no longer just for Google employees. X

story:
About The Artist

After establishing a name for himself at Marvel on KILLRAVEN and DR. STRANGE, P. Craig Russell went on to become one of the pioneers in opening new vistas for this underestimated field with, among other works, adaptations of operas by Mozart (THE MAGIC FLUTE), Strauss (SALOME) and Wagner (THE RING OF THE NIBELUNG). 

Russell is considered by most fans to be the definitive artist of the comics version of Michael Moorcock's Elric of Melniboné and has also created stellar visualizations of characters as diverse as Doctor Strange, Batman, The Sandman, Death, Conan, Hellboy and The Spirit. He has also adapted and beautifully illustrated five volumes of THE FAIRY TALES OF OSCAR WILDE. 

Some of his most acclaimed work has been with Newbery award-winning writer Neil Gaiman, first on the landmark 50th issue of THE SANDMAN for DC Comics/Vertigo, then with widely-seen graphic novel adaptations of Gaiman's MURDER MYSTERIES, CORALINE and THE GRAVEYARD BOOK. 

You can read more about Craig via his official website.

 

 

The P. Craig Russell Sketchbook Archives

This epic hardcover volume gives you an as-yet-unseen look at the master artist's actual drawing process with figure studies, character designs, expression and gesture studies and more. Every stunning illustration is meticulously scanned from PCR's personal, private sketchbooks, and the artist himself provides illuminating background information and notes. The book is 250 pages, approximately 11" by 8.5" dimension-wise (landscape-formatted), with a matte-laminated hardcover.

 


 

"I got my book last week. It's beautiful, easily the best Kickstarter book in both design and content that I've been rewarded with. I feel very happy to have been part of bringing this exquisite book to life. Kudos to the incomparable Mr. Russell for creating all those wonderful sketches and to his book designer for putting it together so wonderfully. Great job, gentlemen." — Satisfied Pledge Partner
 

 

Front Cover, Endpapers & Sample Interior Pages

story:
Here is where you come in:

  • This is a great opportunity to boost Feral Christine’s profile and grow as a team! In order to make this weekend a reality we need to pay for registration fees, gas money, and food once we get there. That’s where you come in! Any donation you can make towards this trip would be amazing and would help us immensely.
     
  • The fee for ComFest 2017 is $75 per group plus $50 per member. Feral Christine has 14 members... which brings us to a grand total of $775.
  • We came up with $550 on our own, so we need to raise $225 for fees as well as...
  • $150 for gas
  • $335 for food
  • $50 for the Indiegogo fees
  • That brings us to our total of $760
     
  • If you are looking for a good deed to do- why not help some funny people have an incredible experience?
     
  • If you cannot give- we totally understand! Please share this campaign on your facebook page, twitter, email... any platform that will help get the word out.

  • Thank you so much for your love and support!

If you are looking for a good deed to do- why not help some funny people have an incredible experience? 
If you cannot give- we totally understand! Please share this campaign on your facebook page, twitter, email... any platform that will help get the word out.
Thank you so much for your love and support!

story:
Mein erstes Artbook

Mein Name ist Bianca, ich wohne bei Leipzig und bin 22 Jahre alt. Ich zeichne eigentlich schon mein ganzes Leben lang. Alle in meiner Familie sind sehr kreativ und führen auch in dieser Richtung einen Beruf aus. Vor knapp 7 Jahren hab ich mich dann an Mangas versucht und träume auch seitdem irgendwann mal damit mein Geld zu verdienen.


Mein Vorhaben :

Kurz und knapp gesagt, ich brauche finanzielle Unterstützung  um mein erstes Artbook zu veröffentlichen. Ich würde mich auch auf Wunschbilder freuen da ich davon einige in meinem Artbook bringen möchte.

Ich zeichne jeden Tag und habe auch schon als Mediengestalter viele Erfahrungen gesammelt, welche für die Zukunft als Mangaka und die Veröffentlichung eines Artbook´s wichtig sind. Es würde für mich ein Traum in Erfüllung gehen, wenn ich mehr aus meinen Bildern machen kann und ein solches Buch veröffentlichen zu können.

Was ihr für euer Geld bekommt:

Für eure Spenden bekommt ihr auch etwas, von kleinen und großen Bildern mit Autogramm, bis hin zu eurem eigenen Wunsch-Manga was dann eventuell in meinen Artbook erscheinen wird (bitte sendet mir dafür eine genaue Beschreibung eurer Vorstellung). 

Ich freue mich natürlich auch, wenn ihr für mich werbt und meine Kampagne bekannt macht.  :)

story:
The Pride is an original 6 issue mini series about an LGBTQ superteam fighting to improve the representation of the LGBTQ community and heroes in their world.

Holding Out For A Hero Pt. 2

Written by Joe Glass (Stiffs)

Art by Gavin Mitchell (Stiffs) and Kris Carter (Lou Scannon); plus Cory Smith (The Independents) and series creator Joe Glass

Cover by Cory Smith and Kris Carter

 

With the team fully formed, all thatâ€™s left to do is train into one well-oiled unit! But with so many strong and independent personalities, can Wolf really rein them in and pull the team together? And when danger calls close to home, will they be ready to save the day?

 

Meanwhile, the team draws the attention of the sinister Reverend and his menacing cohort, Basher. And that is probably not what The Pride needs or wants!


As ever, issue 2 features 22 pages of the main feature story, as well as two one page Origin stories! This issue sees the origins of Angel and Muscle Mary, with art done by series creator Joe Glass and Cory Smith. 


The Impact

As is the teams aim in the series, the aim of The Pride comic is to increase and improve the representation of the LGBTQ (lesbian, gay, bisexual, trans and queer) community in comics, by showing that you can do an epic mainstream-styled superhero team book with LGBTQ characters and it will be just as good and accessible as with straight heroes.

Comics are still sorely lacking in representation for LGBTQ fans, though things are improving and we hope to continue doing our part.

What We Need & What You Get

Here is your chance to preorder the upcoming second issue of The Pride, currently sue for release in February via Deadstar Publishing. Money raised is to get your copy printed and posted to you, and any left over helps fund the production of the comic.

Other Ways You Can Help

There are many ways to do your part for The Pride! You can fund/preorder your copy here, or you can just help by spreading the word. You can help by approaching your Local Comic Shop and asking them to stock The Pride (just tell them to Google Deadstar Publishing, all ordering details can be found there).


Please note: if you funded for the whole series in the previous campaign for The Pride as a whole, then you do not need to fund here; your preorder still stands! This is for new funders/readers, and those who would like an extra copy of the issue

story:
So who is this and what are they trying to do?

Heya I’m Anthea West, a Comic Artist, Illustrator and Animator from Dublin! I’m a full time student and a part time comic creator though I’m hoping for that to change within the next year. I’m a member of Zenpop Indie Comics where I have my Webcomic Desolate Ceremony hosted there: http://zenpop.org/desolateceremony. Comics and stories are a huge passion of mine and something I really want to set my career on. 

This campaign is to raise funds for my upcoming comic The Earthbound God, it’s my biggest project yet and it's something I've been developing for over a year now. I think this comic it will really help get my name out there in Irish/English comic scene. At the moment I’m simply a small fish!

Without funding I have no hope of getting my book printed out into the world and onto the Convention circuit so this is why I’m humbling asking for a helping hand. 

How you can help

The goal is $500. With this I’ll be able to print out a large number of books, not just to sell at conventions but to send out to people and sell in comic shops like Forbidden Planet. If by some miracle I make over the marker I may be able to invest in making an Art book as well. This however is not the focus, The Earthbound God is. 

The Perks, depending on how much you donate are:

Exclusive Desktop Wallpaper

 

Handdrawn Personalized Earthbound God Artwork of an animal of your choosing:

A Signed Pre-Ordered book!

 

All perks will be finished and sent out before September however I'm unable to give a percise date as some of these perks are personalized and will need time to make and then sent out. 

If I don’t reach my entire goal I should still be able to print some books, just in much smaller numbers, so any small amount will help.

Other Ways You Can Help:

If you can’t donated but still like to help out then please spread the word about this campaign.  Share with friends, on Facebook, Tumblr, Deviantart or Twitter whatever one you use.  The more people who know, the better! 

Also please support the comic by following the Earthbound God tumblr, where new info, concepts and detail of the book will be posted: http://theearthboundgod.tumblr.com/ 

Thank you very much for reading!

story:
Help us tell our story!         

Deos Rising is a new graphic novel written by Chris and David Edgerly, based on their feature length script, with artwork by David Edgerly. The story is ready to go and character and background design is already underway, but we need $10,000 to produce the complete issue and print copies.

David Edgerly has worked in graphic design, illustration and animation for over ten years, and brings that experience to Deos Rising. Chris Edgerly has worked with David as a writing partner for years, and has a busy career as a voice actor in Los Angeles. 

We think the screenplay would make a great movie, and it has a first-time director attached, but it's epic in scope, and that means big budget. With a graphic novel to help express the idea visually, we think there'll be no stopping us. 

What We Need and What You'll Get    


With $10,000 in funding, that will give David the time and resources he needs to do this story justice. He's worked enough in the comic book world to know that you can't rush a job like this, and it'll take two to three months to create a professional quality issue. That will also cover the printing expenses as well.

We've created some really cool perks for different levels of donations as a nice incentive. Everyone who contributes at least five bucks gets a pdf of the issue, but contribute twenty and you get a first edition, printed copy! And it gets even cooler after that! We're also offering signed artwork, a chance to see yourself drawn into the story, and for a few incredibly generous donors, an entire page of signed artwork with computer-designed backgrounds!

But what if we don't reach our goal? That's always a possibility, but rest assured, no matter what we raise, David will use it as resources to produce as much of the issue as possible. There's even a plan to produce a condensed version of the story should we come up short. In other words, we don't give up easy.

What This Means        


To us, this means the chance to tell a story we think people will love. Imagine a world with immortals and demons hiding in plain sight, and with only a small, super-secret cadre of guys like our hero to keep them from destroying everything in their wake. It's got action, adventure, a cool hero (with an inner conflict, of course), a wicked villain and an entire universe of gods and demons ready to go toe-to-toe with our main characters. And it's only the beginning - our screenplay is the first in a planned trilogy, so there's so much more story to tell! 

And for you, the contributor, it means the chance to not only enjoy the story, but to know you helped make it happen! Not to mention some pretty nice perks if you donate enough!

Other Ways to Help


We understand that not everyone can contribute funds, but they can help get the word out. Send this link to anyone you know that enjoys a great adventure story, or help us spread the word on Facebook or even around Indiegogo! It's a team effort, and we can't get there alone. Let's make this happen!

story:
What kind of dog is this?

Hello, my name is  Malin Falch and I am the artist and writer for the webcomic Zombie Waffe.

Zombie Waffe is a webcomic about a zombie apocalypse, and some guys struggling to survive it... lame summary, but it's more interesting than it sounds! (I hope)

ZW was a comic I started drawing about two years ago from now, I only did it for my own enjoyment, having always wanted to make a comic, but never gotten any far with my ideas, I set myself a goal that this, this comic wasn't gonna be scrapped.

And it wasn't! I have seen a huge interest from people since this comic started, and it really is the fuel that drives me to continue it, the best thing I know is to hear from people that they enjoy reading it, and wants to know what happens next! Even when my personal life takes over and updates are few, people still write to me, and makes me remember why I love making it.

 

This stupid donation thing


To explain this shortly, I just got out of high school and is heading to art university in the wonderful city San Francisco, to realize my dream about becoming an illustrator/comic artist/concept artist.

I have just moved to god knows where, and had gotten myself a job here that paid pretty well, until I got FIRED. Those moneys were pretty important for me as they were gonna pay for the plane tickets, as well as equipment for my uni experience.

So this is a last desperate attempt at making the money I would have made with my job this summer.

 

What do YOU benefit from this crap?


Now that I don't have a job anymore, I can focus a 100% on Zombie Waffe! That means UPDATES FOR EVERYONE!!!

I am very excited to start ZW up again, after the long break I had while I was finishing high school! 

I have big plans for this comic, and going to art university will benefit this comic greatly! But don't worry, you don't have to donate for me to update zw, that is something I would have done anyways ;)

 

Other Ways You Can Help

The second job I have this summer to make up for my lost job is that I take commissions, if you head over to my deviantart page right here http://detkef.deviantart.com/journal/?offset=1#/d4vo980 you can see the details. Want art done? you have come to the right place! Be serious before you contact me though, I don't like people leaving me high and dry! Send me a mail at ZombieWaffe@gmail.com if you're interested ;)

What kind of dog is this?
Hello, my name is  Malin Falch and I am the artist and writer for the webcomic Zombie Waffe.
Zombie Waffe is a webcomic about a zombie apocalypse, and some guys struggling to survive it... lame summary, but it's more interesting than it sounds! (I hope)
ZW was a comic I started drawing about two years ago from now, I only did it for my own enjoyment, having always wanted to make a comic, but never gotten any far with my ideas, I set myself a goal that this, this comic wasn't gonna be scrapped.
And it wasn't! I have seen a huge interest from people since this comic started, and it really is the fuel that drives me to continue it, the best thing I know is to hear from people that they enjoy reading it, and wants to know what happens next! Even when my personal life takes over and updates are few, people still write to me, and makes me remember why I love making it.
 
This stupid donation thing
To explain this shortly, I just got out of high school and is heading to art university in the wonderful city San Francisco, to realize my dream about becoming an illustrator/comic artist/concept artist.
I have just moved to god knows where, and had gotten myself a job here that paid pretty well, until I got FIRED. Those moneys were pretty important for me as they were gonna pay for the plane tickets, as well as equipment for my uni experience.
So this is a last desperate attempt at making the money I would have made with my job this summer.
 
What do YOU benefit from this crap?

Now that I don't have a job anymore, I can focus a 100% on Zombie Waffe! That means UPDATES FOR EVERYONE!!!
I am very excited to start ZW up again, after the long break I had while I was finishing high school! 
I have big plans for this comic, and going to art university will benefit this comic greatly! But don't worry, you don't have to donate for me to update zw, that is something I would have done anyways ;)


 
Other Ways You Can Help


The second job I have this summer to make up for my lost job is that I take commissions, if you head over to my deviantart page right here http://detkef.deviantart.com/journal/?offset=1#/d4vo980 you can see the details. Want art done? you have come to the right place! Be serious before you contact me though, I don't like people leaving me high and dry! Send me a mail at ZombieWaffe@gmail.com if you're interested ;)

story:
A Late Breakfast

From up and coming Japanese illustrator, Imoman, we are delighted to offer A Late Breakfast Limited 1st Edition 1000-piece puzzle.

A balance of flora, fauna, fungi, gnomes and magical creatures intricately woven into the perfect little ecosystem. Honestly, there is so much to see in this piece, you'll find something new every time you look at it!

What We're Offering

  • Premium quality Limited 1st Edition 1000-piece puzzles
  • Exact Puzzle Dimensions: 27.52" x 19.57" (69.90 cm x 49.70 cm). 
  • Each puzzle comes in a Limited Edition box, 14 5/8" x 10 5/8" x 2 1/8" (37.16 cm x 27 cm x 6.68 cm). 
  • Each puzzle and box have a textured linen finish, featuring pristine imagery with bright, bold, beautiful colors. 
  • Manufactured in Europe with the highest quality materials. 
  • Certificate of Authenticity and Kickstarter Exclusive Postcard included with each puzzle.

Other Puzzles Available through this Indiegogo

Spring in Sakuragaoka by AYMRC

 

 

Flow of Goldfish by Fuzichoco

Dragon King's Daughter by Fuzichoco 

Shipping

We were very pleased with the results of the fulfillment and shipping process last year, so we're going with the same model this time around.

 

All US rewards will be fulfilled by us, Playing Grounded. Rewards shipping to backers in Europe and internationally will be fulfilled by Happyshops. Shipping is VAT FREE for EU backers.

 

Who Are We?

Eric and Lara Andersen are the owners of Playing Grounded, Ltd. Playing Grounded is more than just a puzzle company. Our goal is to provide an alternative to popular culture for those with refined tastes looking for high-quality products and collectible art. We work one-on-one with independent artists that specialize in anime/animation, gaming, and comic styles of art—to offer you fun, beautiful, captivating art that you can appreciate for years to come.

Thank you for your support!

 

Risks and Challenges

This will be our third time placing an order with this manufacturer. We feel confident that they will deliver the same quality within a reasonable time frame. Of course, there are always risks when importing merchandise. We take every precaution to ensure that the shipment will arrive safely. Please know that we will keep you informed every step of the way through updates, comments, and when necessary, private messages. Happyshops has proven their accuracy and efficiency, and we have our system in place here. If there are delays or issues, you will all be notified. Please message us with questions at any point during and post-campaign.

story:
MAY 29th Update:

Hello Everyone!

Once again thank you for the amazing support you have shown for our BIG BOOK campaign!  We are blown away by the demand for this historic collection of Ben Garrison Cartoons.

The BIG BOOK is at the printers and they are indicating the Book proofs maybe ready by Friday, May 31st. So things are moving quickly.  As soon as proofs are approved we will move to the actual printing.

We also have good news that we should have over a hundred books that will be available for purchase at our grrrgraphics.com shop for those that missed the Indiegogo campaign.  We will let you know when the book is available for pre-order at Grrrgraphics.com.

The printer has given us an estimate of 8 to 9 weeks for the printing and 2 weeks for shipping, if the schedule changes we will let you know. 

Also this is a good time to double check your shipping addresses as you can update your address in your Indiegogo account.

Thanks again!

Tina and Ben Garrison

 

May 14th Update:

 

Ben is putting the finishing touches on the BIG BOOK OF CARTOONS, including an upgrade to an embossed Ben Garrison Logo on a gold cloth bound wrap for the front book cover. 

The FINISHED Book heads to the printers 2 weeks from today on the same day that payments from Indiegogo get transfered into our account. Printing time estimates are between 4 to 6 weeks and then shipping takes 2 weeks from the printer. We plan to keep everyone updated here. 

Make sure all your contact information and shipping addresses are updated and correct and all funds secured. Also if you want the signed book, you have to have a shipping address entered and have chosen the signed or unsigned book perk.  If you have made a $100 contribution and did not enter a shipping address, you need to send us your shipping address and your contribution number so you can receive your book. Contact Tina at info@grrrgraphics.com

Thank you again for supporting the BIG BOOK OF CARTOONS, 

Ben and Tina

 

 

 

April 26th Update: 

Wow! Thank you for helping us hit our stretch goal- All Book orders will now include a sheet of MAGA stickers. 

April 5th Update: 

Just a reminder to everyone that you can make a donation of any amount to help fund the BIG BOOK or you can select your Perk and pre-order your signed book.  Book perks will have a place for your shipping address while just a  donation won't.   

Thank you

April 1st Update From Ben Garrison:

I was on the Alex Jones show today and when he heard about our coffee table book, he offered to help us sell ‘thousands’ of them.

Alex is a generous man who wants to help and it’s appreciated by us, but there won’t be thousands of books printed. It's not his fault for saying such a thing because I never got a chance to explain to him that we are offering a limited edition of 1,000 signed and numbered (and hardbound) coffee table books. The uniqueness and rarity of the book is what makes it more desirable and once they are sold, there will be no more printed. So rest assured, our plans to print only 1,000 copies has not changed.

However, we will probably publish another book after the 2020 election as a sequel to my “2016 Presidential Election Collection,” and that book won’t be limited. —

Ben Garrison

 

No Collusion Update: We hit 150% our goal! Thank you for the support.

EVERY Book will be upgraded to a very good, heavy weight paper stock for the inside pages.

At 250% of our goal we will add the Toon stickers to everyone's book! 

Tina and Ben Garrison

Update From Ben:

 

THE BIG BOOK OF CARTOONS- 10 YEARS OF VIRAL BEN GARRISON COMICS

 "Gulliver's President"  created in 2019

The American people have awakened.

The Globalists thought they were winning.

But you had other ideas. 

Millions saw Ben Garrison cartoons during the 2016 election. Ben was one of the few political cartoonists that supported the America First agenda put forth by President Trump.

Ben's cartoons were retweeted by the biggest names on twitter, including James Woods, Donald Trump Jr. and many more.  President Trump himself retweeted Tina's "Red Wave" cartoon and posted it on his social media. What an honor!

But we could not have achieved this without you, Hillary's so called Deplorables!  You made this possible, we are humbled by your support.
We wanted to do something really special for the 10 year anniversary of GrrrGraphics cartoons to thank you.


 

"A House Divided" created 2018


Our supporters have asked for a big, hardbound book for years, and we hear you.

The Book is 9 inches by 12 inches of full color cartoon splendor!
The Book will be a hardbound art book.

 We estimate  200 to 250 pages of classic viral Ben Garrison cartoons, that's over 400 cartoons.

 Included in the book will be some VERY politically incorrect cartoons that have never been published and NEW cartoons created just for the book.

GOAL: We will print 1000 signed and numbered art books. The funds will go to creating and printing the  book.  Our stretch goals will be upgrading the book to glossy paper and printing additional books and adding more exciting perks!

From the very first Ben Garrison cartoon drawn in 2009 to the latest cartoons in 2019, this YUGE full color book can be proudly displayed in your home.

This will be a true time capsule of the historic times we are living through.  From the "March of Tyranny" to Hillary's lost "shoe', this book will keep you paging through looking for the next hidden Easter egg.

Get started by choosing your level and let's do this together!

story:
Millennial Falcon Comics - Adventures of a Spaceship Illegally Powered By Music. Each issue comes with an album!

First Printings of Millennial Falcon Comics Issue #0 and Hikikomori EP will be available for sale here too, but quantities are limited

FFO: Rick and Morty, Flaming Lips, X-Men, Vertigo Comics, Gorillaz, Adult Swim, Spinal Tap, The Clash, FLCL, Adventure Time, Cowboy Bebop, XTC

Millennial Falcon Comics is an ongoing comic book series telling the semi-autobiographical tale of the Millennial Falcon band from Portland, Oregon. This stoner comic book experience takes you inside Millennial Falcon's albums (and personal lives) in a fantastical, science fiction way. 

The comic's space-fight universe is a no-holds-barred parody of post-trust-busting American corporations like Disney, filtered through the stoned out, rebellious eyes of independent musicians with nothing to lose.

In this universe, laissez faire on an intergalactic scale has created a totalitarian conglomerate; the archetypal 'evil empire' named the Federation of Job Creators. Comic book versions of the Millennial Falcon band members face the familiar hardships of independent music while attempting to hide a rocket engine illegally powered by music from the Musical Space Empire (one of many subdivision of the Federation of Job Creators).


Each issue of Millennial Falcon Comics comes with a new album of original music.

We Just Want To Sell You Music and Comic Books:


The real-life Millennial Falcon band in Portland, Oregon.

We are using this pre-sale to run through the last of our previous issue/album bundles and cover the expenses of beginning this new storyline with Millennial Falcon Comics Issue #1. 

  • You can pick up the last copies of Millennial Falcon Issue #0. It coincides with Millennial Falcon's album Hikikomori. These Millennial Falcon Comics Issue #0/Hikikomori bundles are very limited. Both are first printings.  
     
  • You can buy Millennial Falcon Comics Issue #1  & Sativa Chemtrails as a bundle.  This bunde will begin production after this pre-sale and is literally paying our artist, Josh frees, letterer Cameron Olszewski & the printers to make this whole issue/album bundle a possibility. Please join us on this adventure!
     
  • IF WE CAN MAKE OVER $1500 - Special enamel pins and patches will be made for anyone with orders of $30 or more. We will ONLY be making these items if we meet or exceed $1500 in pre-sales. We want to see them as much as you do. Let's get there together!

    Some of Josh Freese's Character Designs for
    the upcoming Millennial Falcon Comics #1:

 



 

WE'VE GOT A LOT OF STORY TO TELL.
IT'S AN ONGOING COMIC BOOK SERIES.


Captain Contingency and Jerry Riggs, busking in a scene from MF Comics #0

Our goal is to get multiple issues out a year, produced independently by our startup, FPM Publishing. Each issue will have its own album of original songs to enrich the story. As of now, the next 6 issues of Millennial Falcon Comics are scripted.

This 6-issue script comprises a storyline where the fictional Millennial Falcon band fights the King of the Dark Web and myriad creeps throughout time and space. Millennial Falcon Comics #1 sets this story into motion while easily bringing new readers up to speed on the adventure.

This is also a great place to start with Millennial Falcon because their Sativa Chemtrails LP captures the band's sound at a turning point. The album's tone begins a hard pivot from Millennial Falcon's usual punchy new wave  poppiness to thick, psychedelic synth-punk sludge.

The goal with this project is to evolve this comic book making process and musical experimentation,  pushing forward a new, more ridiculous storyline in Millennial Falcon Comics with each issue. 


The Millennial Falcon's ugly exterior hides an engine powered
illegally by music. From MF Comics Issue #0

TO RECAP:

  • Ordering Millennial Falcon Comics #1 & Sativa Chemtrails directly pays independent artists and provides stability for our musicians/writers to extend their fantasy music universe. We will ship these orders right to your door.
     
  • Our goal of at most $1500 for issue #1/Sativa Chemtrails LP is very modest. For now, we simply want get these stories and albums out to happy fans. Every artist, writer and producer involved is looking to create a network for the continued production of Millennial Falcon Comics and album combos.  We need your eyes and ears, true believer!


                    FPM PUBLISHING
Millennial Falcon's DIY Publishing House

PREVIEW MILLENNIAL FALCON'S MUSIC AND COMICS FOR FREE:

Millennial Falcon hosts Issue #0 for free streaming at  www.millennialfalconcomics.com

All Millennial Falcon albums available for free download at www.millennialfalcon.bandcamp.com

Millennial Falcon's music is available on Spotify, Soundcloud, Apple Music and anywhere else you stream music.

FPM PUBLISHING, our DIY publishing house, can be reached at www.youaredoingeverythingwrong.com

NOW ORDER SOME OF THESE COMIC & ALBUM COMBOS FOR HOME DELIVERY.  I ASSURE YOU, IT'S A SOLID IDEA.


See you, Space Hipster . . .

story:
The Savage Swordsman is an acclaimed Action/Adventure comic. featuring Rukata The Immortal Savage Swordsman and his century-long battle against the forces of darkness as part of an ongoing series from Tyrant comics the comic came out in 2015 to great reviews and now the comic is available on Indiegogo. 

Savage Swordsman #1 cover by Edwin Domingo 

About the Author

The Savage Swordsman was created by Chris Ryahn, Who also created  Tyrant comics, Doomtrain and Starfree comics that have been independently published in print in Comic Bookstores and is now available on Indiegogo. 

Chibi Swordsman cover by Marcelo Salaza

About the Artist

This Savage Swordsman cover was done by Black Strife artist Marcelo Salaza, You can see more of Marcelo's artwork here on the Black Strife Indiegogo. 

You can see more about that here:

Tyrant comics #1 Savage Swordsman : The Night of the Swordsman cover

The Night of the Swordsman is a stand alone one shot comic set to help explain the events in The Savage Swordsman #1 by introducing new characters that will have a lasting affect though the series. While not being mandatory it does further explore the lore of the series.

Character artwork for the Savage Swordsman

Savage Swordsman shirts. 

We have a amazing array of shirts available at our Teespring store that is constantly updated when ever we feel like it.  Make sure to check it out from time to time to see what shows up. 

For everyone who has backed the comic at any tier. Just message and get a discount code on any of the shirts. Just one of the ways you get it better with us!

Store https://teespring.com/stores/tyrant-comics

 

Reviews for The Savage Swordsman #1

Comicvine  "This will be a lasting hit for generations" 

Comic Bastards "Every once and a while, a comic comes along that changes everything. This is one of those comics" 

Comic book review club "This might just become a new hit. I was truly entertained, so it definitely fulfilled my expectations. Savage Swordsman is a nicely done comic book that will give you more than a few chuckles. Join the Swordsman on his journey to becoming a legend - in his own unique way of course. If I had to give Savage Swordsman a rating, I would give it 5 out of 5 stars”

How about reviews on Twitter? an actual YouTuber

Some more.

 More. 

even more.

Better then Spider-man.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Follow us on Twitter

Twitter is the best way to stay up to date with the latest and greatest from Tyrant comics, and very much more on Twitter https://twitter.com/ChrisRyahn to follow us it is free! 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Character artwork for the Savage Swordsman

Stretch goals

The campaign funding goals are set very low. help us continue The Savage Swordsman!  The goals of this campaign will be to complete the story started in the Savage Swordsman #1  by completing issues 2-5 The story is set to continue after Issue 5. With The Night of the Swordsman and the Lady Swordsman two stand alone titles. And much, much more to come! 

$1500 - Lady Swordsman tier -

  • Lady Swordsman comic - Everyone above $15 tier gets PDF copies of Lady Swordsman when it comes out. 

$3000 - Locked -

  • Savage Swordsman # 2
  • Plus more stuff. 

$5000 - Locked - 

  • It takes a lot of money - Help us with The Savage Swordsman game! 
  • At this point the campaign would be completed but would remain open for new backers to order from. 

 

Rewards

Not only are you supporting a comic publisher making some of the best comics out right now. You are also supporting the fight against corrupt companies by supporting independent studios. 

  • Support an amazing comics company. 
  • All shipped order will have a Savage Swordsman logo button. there will be one for each comic published by Tyrant comics. collect them all. 
  • The Money goes towards making fantastic comics. VIP tier gets a behind the scenes look at comics. 
  • Savage Swordsman Alt cover

Meaning you can get three amazing comics and support the greatest comics label the world has ever seen.

      • Tell your friends and family about the Savage Swordsman and Tyrant comics. 
      • Retweet and share this project on Facebook and twitter. 
      • Retweet and share Tyrant webcomics. 

      And that's all there is to it. Let's change the world together.
story_txt:
The Savage Swordsman is an acclaimed Action/Adventure comic. featuring Rukata The Immortal Savage Swordsman and his century-long battle against the forces of darkness as part of an ongoing series from Tyrant comics the comic came out in 2015 to great reviews and now the comic is available on Indiegogo. 

Savage Swordsman #1 cover by Edwin Domingo 
About the Author
The Savage Swordsman was created by Chris Ryahn, Who also created  Tyrant comics, Doomtrain and Starfree comics that have been independently published in print in Comic Bookstores and is now available on Indiegogo. 


Chibi Swordsman cover by Marcelo Salaza
About the Artist
This Savage Swordsman cover was done by Black Strife artist Marcelo Salaza, You can see more of Marcelo's artwork here on the Black Strife Indiegogo. 
You can see more about that here:

Tyrant comics #1 Savage Swordsman : The Night of the Swordsman cover
The Night of the Swordsman is a stand alone one shot comic set to help explain the events in The Savage Swordsman #1 by introducing new characters that will have a lasting affect though the series. While not being mandatory it does further explore the lore of the series.

Character artwork for the Savage SwordsmanSavage Swordsman shirts. We have a amazing array of shirts available at our Teespring store that is constantly updated when ever we feel like it.  Make sure to check it out from time to time to see what shows up. For everyone who has backed the comic at any tier. Just message and get a discount code on any of the shirts. Just one of the ways you get it better with us!Store https://teespring.com/stores/tyrant-comics Reviews for The Savage Swordsman #1Comicvine  "This will be a lasting hit for generations" Comic Bastards "Every once and a while, a comic comes along that changes everything. This is one of those comics" Comic book review club "This might just become a new hit. I was truly entertained, so it definitely fulfilled my expectations. Savage Swordsman is a nicely done comic book that will give you more than a few chuckles. Join the Swordsman on his journey to becoming a legend - in his own unique way of course. If I had to give Savage Swordsman a rating, I would give it 5 out of 5 stars” How about reviews on Twitter? an actual YouTuberSome more. More. even more.Better then Spider-man.----------------------------------------------------------------------------------Follow us on TwitterTwitter is the best way to stay up to date with the latest and greatest from Tyrant comics, and very much more on Twitter https://twitter.com/ChrisRyahn to follow us it is free! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------Character artwork for the Savage SwordsmanStretch goalsThe campaign funding goals are set very low. help us continue The Savage Swordsman!  The goals of this campaign will be to complete the story started in the Savage Swordsman #1  by completing issues 2-5 The story is set to continue after Issue 5. With The Night of the Swordsman and the Lady Swordsman two stand alone titles. And much, much more to come! $1500 - Lady Swordsman tier -Lady Swordsman comic - Everyone above $15 tier gets PDF copies of Lady Swordsman when it comes out. $3000 - Locked -
Savage Swordsman # 2
Plus more stuff. 
$5000 - Locked - 
It takes a lot of money - Help us with The Savage Swordsman game! 
At this point the campaign would be completed but would remain open for new backers to order from.

Support an amazing comics company. 
All shipped order will have a Savage Swordsman logo button. there will be one for each comic published by Tyrant comics. collect them all.

story:
Short Summary

Hello! I'm Nathan Fehr, creator of Interesting Times. I've been drawing for as long as I can remember, and wrote journal comics on a regular basis until June of this year. I loved getting to do it, and over time built a small but loyal fanbase. In 2012 I worked with my friends Steve & Kayla to put a book together, and readers helped us fund the creation of an incredible hardcover collection of the best comics of the first two years.

It was exciting to make and I got a lot of positive feedback. But almost as soon as people had the first one they started asking: “So, when is volume two coming out?”

I’ve said “Soon” a lot over the years, and meant it, but making books isn’t our day job and real life had a few other things for me and my friends to take care of first. Regardless, we kept meeting and working on bits and pieces of the book, and at long last I’m happy to report: Volume Two is ready to happen! The way things currently look, it should be in our hands by February 2018!

...with a little more of your help, of course ;)

What We Need & What You Get

"Interesting Times: Year Three, Four & Five" will contain the best Interesting Times comics printed in black and white on high quality 50 lb paper with hardcover and foil stamping. To get this done, we’ve once again reached out to Friesens, a Southern Manitoba-based company that does high quality publishing work. They gave us a printing price per unit of $17.20, so in order to print 150 books we need $2580.

 

We kept all the proceeds from the first volume to help pay for this one, which means that even if we fall a little short of our goal we can still go forward with printing! This fundraising page is actually to serve as a sort of pre-order system for you, the reader. It’ll help us collect funds and compile your information to make fulfillment super easy when the book is in our hands early next year.

Once again, in return for your support we want to throw some cool extras at you! A $30 pledge guarantees you a physical copy of the book when it’s available. At $60, you get the Indiegogo exclusive Pirate Edition with custom drawings by the author AND the never-before-offered Interesting Times t-shirt! At the highest tier you can get a cool collection of banners, just like this one! (smiling author for scale)

Please note: T-Shirts and framed banners are for local (Southern MB) pickup only. We can't afford to ship this stuff, sorry :(

The Impact

I’ve always been amazed and humbled that people made my comics a part of their day, and the creation of the first book was such an exciting extension of that. People responded in such a positive way to it, and it even attracted brand new readers who’d never heard of the site. So of course we want to continue the series, and achieve the ultimate dream: a row of books on shelves, representing the best of the whole run of Interesting Times!

For you, the impact is probably a lot like the first time around; this book will be something fun to have on the coffee table, something unique to have on the bookshelf, or (as before) just something stable to put a monitor on. Whatever motivates you, I want to thank you in advance for helping out. I know you're going to enjoy the finished product.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word about this campaign! Even if you don't contribute financially, tell somebody about it! You can link this page directly in whatever way you choose OR use IndieGoGo's share tools! It would be incredibly cool of you!

story:
STRETCH GOAL ACHIEVED!

We're excited to announce the first Gem Mint stretch goal in this awesome inaugural IndieGoGo project!  If we can reach $10,000 on this Vampirella #16 Limited Edition Variant Cover program, all pledge level backers will receive a free exclusive limited edition promotional trading card commemorating the project!  

 

WHO IS GEM MINT?

Gem Mint got his start on Instagram in 2014. He built a name for himself in the collecting community through buying and selling comic books. In 2017 he launched his YouTube channel to share his love of comics and collectibles. He has since gained 100,000 subscribers and amassed 15 million views. He specializes in statue unboxings, omnibus breakdowns, and weekly comic book reviews.

You can find the Gem Mint YouTube page here: 

http://youtube.com/channel/UC31fEeAOTnfRgvGFwYJsFUA?sub_confirmation=1

 

 

THE FIRST GEM MINT EXCLUSIVE VARIANT COVER COMIC!

 

VAMPIRELLA #16

 

This is a big issue! We kick off Year Two of the 50th Anniversary Vampirella series with the prologue to "Interstellar," the chronicle of Vampirella's journey back to her home planet of Drakulon. Lilith has vanished under mysterious circumstances leaving Vampirella-- who's never had the best relationship with her mom-- torn between accepting Lilith's disappearance or going to her rescue, which would require her finding a way back to her home world. Caving in to the inevitable, Vampirella has only one place she can begin her journey -- the human she rescued from Drakulon all those years ago and re-create the accident that brought him there.

Written by award winning writer Christopher Priest (Quantum & Woody, Deathstroke, and Black Panther)

Interior Art by European illustrator Ergun Gunduz (Taxi Tales, the record breaking Vampirella Vol 5 - aka 50th Anniversary series)

 

Ken Haeser is a comic book artist and writer, and graduate of the Joe Kubert School of comic art. He is best known for his work on the The Living Corpse graphic novel by Dynamite Entertainment and covers for comics like Batman/TMNT, Back to the Future, and Flash Gordon.

CGC COPIES

Need to add perfection to your collection?  Get any of the four exclusive variant covers slabbed and CGC graded at 9.8 or higher.

The "main" CGC cover is also available SIGNED by the artist, KEN HAESER!

ART COVERS BY KEN HAESER

Ken Haeser is sketching on covers, as well as creating original cover art on blank covers.

STATUES

Gem Mint knows a lot about resin collectibles and two of Dynamite's most recent Vampirella releases are now available as part of this campaign.

VAMPIRELLA

Based on the design of Artgerm

This 7.5" tall resin bust is based on Artgerm's illustration for the cover to Vampirella #2 and features hand-painted detail.

VAMPIRELLA

based on the design of Joe Gonzalez

This 12" tall resin statue is hand-painted and based on the iconic pose by Jose Gonzalez, taken from the classic Warren Magazine era.

story:
A controversially fresh take on frontier justice from the creator of LAIR!

PISTOLERA is a hardboiled western laden with splattered blood, whizzing bullets, death, tenacity, racial slurs, bible verses, and a pissed off pregnant gunslinger!

If you liked films such as HATEFUL EIGHT, DJANGO UNCHAINED, ONCE UPON A TIME IN MEXICO, QUIGLEY DOWN UNDER, HANNIE CAULDER, or any of SERGIO LEONE's SPAGHETTI WESTERNS, then you will love PISTOLERA!

 

 

 

 

 

 

Interior Art already inked! 

 

The Cast

Valencia Valdez - A quiet 15 year-old teenager who witnessed the brutal murder of her parents.

 

 

Victorio "Velocidad" Valdez - Estranged, fugitive gunslinger, wanted for raiding lynch proceedings, armed robbery, murder, and theft of exotic birds.

 

Colton Hicks - Newly appointed sheriff of the town Dorado Trails, formed shortly after the Mexican American war. Has the power to take away freedom and innocence on a deadly whim. 

 

 

 

PREVIEW THE FIRST PISTOLERA PAGES

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

PISTOLERA PROMO PIECES

Interior Art already inked! 

 

The Cast
Valencia Valdez - A quiet 15 year-old teenager who witnessed the brutal murder of her parents.
 
 
Victorio "Velocidad" Valdez - Estranged, fugitive gunslinger, wanted for raiding lynch proceedings, armed robbery, murder, and theft of exotic birds.

 
Colton Hicks - Newly appointed sheriff of the town Dorado Trails, formed shortly after the Mexican American war. Has the power to take away freedom and innocence on a deadly whim. 
 

 
 
PREVIEW THE FIRST PISTOLERA PAGES
 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 

 
 

PISTOLERA PROMO PIECES

story:
What is Townsville Comic Con?


Townsville Comic Con is a Family Friendly Pop Culture Convention being held in Townsville, QLD on the 23rd April at the Townsville PCYC.

We are a group of Fans who have launched numerous campaigns over the last few years to try and get one of the established Pop Culture Conventions (Supanova, Oz Comic-Con etc...) in Australia to add more regional area's to their list of destinations. After little success we took it upon ourselves to organize Cairns's Very first Pop Culture Convention on July 11th 2015 called TropiCon. TropiCon was an overwhelming success and will be returning to Cairns on an annual basis. More than 400 people traveled from Townsville to be at TropiCon so in light of this we have decided to launch Townsville very own Pop Culture Convention in 2016!

We have worked tirelessly behind the scenes to ensure a great day for all attendees and guests. But now we turn to you for assistance.

Hosting a Con is no easy or cheap event. We have secured a number of high profile guests/celebrities who will be traveling from all over Australia and even internationally  to appear at Townsville Comic Con  . Some we have announced, many we haven't. This crowd funding campaign will raise the funds needed to secure some of the guests appearances as well as contribute to to the cost of venue hire.

But we aren't asking you to donate money for nothing. Really all we are asking is for you to Pre-Purchase a ticket for the day. And we will throw in some sweet rewards too!

What We Need & What You Get

Here is what you will get for your money:

  • At the basic level you will get your Pre-Purchased ticket. This will be your only chance to buy tickets at a discounted price and with no booking fees!
  • At the higher levels we have been very fortunate with some of our guests donating some cool rewards. Prints, sketch books, comics, all signed by their creators are available as rewards. As well as getting you an entry ticket.
We will use any money donated to us for the hire of the Venue, as well as pay for travel expenses and appearance fee's of the guests including some yet to be announced ones that will make you not regret helping us in the early days.

The Impact

The idea of a Regional Pop Culture Convention is a dream held by all who live outside of a Capital City. With your help, both on this campaign and on the day, we can show the rest of Fandom that it can be done, and done well. 

Even if you aren't a comic book person, maybe Anime, Video Games, TV & Movies are your thing, don't worry, we have you covered too!

We have secured other guests that fit into these categories but we just cant announce them yet. We hope you have some faith and trust in us to show you all a great day. Remember, we are Fans too and know what you want!

Other Ways You Can Help

Share, Share, Share! Either by sharing this campaign, liking and sharing our Facebook page www.facebook.com/TownsvilleComicCon and most of all, tell your friends and family!

Visit us on the website www.townsvillecomiccon.com.au (currently under construction) to keep up to date with all the news and latest announcements!

story:
NOUVELLE CAMPAGNE> CLIQUEZ ICI: AZVALTYA 2

MERCI POUR VOTRE PARTICIPATION !

Rendez-vous dans la boutique Auderset pour commander votre BD en ligne, ou dans votre librairie habituelle ! www.auderset.com/boutique 

 

L'Atelier Auderset, en bref

Alain Auderset fait de la BD depuis plus de 20 ans. Auto-édité et auto-financé, il a vécu un incroyable parcours qui lui a permis de mettre en place l’Atelier Auderset. La survie financière de l’Atelier est une lutte de chaque instant.
Marlgré un succès d’estime, la vente des BD ne suffit de loin pas à couvrir tous les frais de fonctionnement et les investissements nécessaires, en particulier lors des mois qui précèdent la sortie d’une nouvelle BD.
Le témoignage d’Alain Auderset : https://youtu.be/ZIKgrHfizew?t=40s

 

 

10ème BD, tout est différent 

Pour «Les souvenirs d’Azvaltya», tout est différent! C’est une BD de science-fiction dans laquelle Marcel fait face à des épreuves qui sont des parallèles avec celles que toi et moi pouvons
rencontrer dans nos vies.
Il s’agit d’un premier opus qui contient un scénario de 60 pages totalement original et qui s’éloigne des autres albums précédemment publiés, dans un registre comique. Cette BD constitue aussi un tournant où nous désirons vous impliquer de plus en plus dans le ministère de l’Atelier Auderset.
Cette campagne de financement participatif marque le début de cette nouvelle stratégie et vous permet de nous soutenir en précommandant la nouvelle BD.
Nous sommes EN LIVE sur facebook tous les jeudis à 19h pour écouter toutes vos idées et propositions afin d’en discuter dans nos réunions et d’orienter nos actions dans le futur.
Sachez également que nous mettons en place un nouveau site web avec un système d’ambassadeurs pour vous permettre d’avoir tout le contenu nécessaire si vous désirez faire connaître le ministère d’Alain autour de vous.

 

LES PACKS DE SOUTIEN

Dans le cadre de cette campagne de financement participatif, nous avons prévu différents moyens de nous soutenir qui incluent tous une contrepartie exclusive qui ne sera plus disponible une fois cette période passée. Quel que soit votre budget, vous pouvez nous soutenir par l’achat d’un des packs proposés!

> PACK GOUTTE D'EAU* [9€]

Chaque goutte d’eau compte...
• Tu fais partie du projet et reçois l’actualité en priorité par email
• Ton contenu exclusif : un fond fond d’écran «Les souvenirs d’Azvaltya» (pour PC/Mac, Tablette et smartphone)
• Ton nom figurera sur la page des remerciements du site... parce qu’on l’a réussie avec toi, cette BD! *Ce pack comprend uniquement du contenu digital

*Ce pack contient du contenu digital uniquement

> COMMUNITY PACK [49€]

Bienvenue à Azvaltya...
• Tu reçois la BD «Les souvenirs d’Azvaltya», numérotée et signée en fin de campagne
• Ta BD sera accompagnée d’une carte de remerciements exclusive, issue de l’univers graphique d’Azvaltya
• Si tu fais partie des 80 premiers inscrits, tu bénéficieras d’une invitation VIP lors de la soirée d’inauguration du 28 octobre!
• Tu reçois le PACK GOUTTE D’EAU

Enlèvement le 28/10/17 à l'atelier ou envoi postal le 25/10/17.

> SUPPORT PACK Early bird - 100 PREMIERS  [ 89€] 

Pour les 100 premiers qui le commandent...
• Tu reçois la BD «Les souvenirs d’Azvaltya» en avant première*, numérotée et signée de 1 à 100
• Tu reçois un tirage exclusif A4 Collector (limité à 500 ex.) sur papier de qualité, numéroté et signé de 1 à 100, issu de l’univers graphique d’Azvaltya • Tu reçois une marche à suivre pour faire le buzz et encourager plus de personnes à participer à la campagne et à rejoindre la communauté Auderset
• Si tu fais partie des 80 premiers inscrits, tu bénéficieras d’une invitation VIP lors de la soirée d’inauguration du 28 octobre!
• Tu reçois les autres avantages des COMMUNITY PACK et PACK GOUTTE D’EAU *


*pour les commandes jusqu’au 28 septembre
Enlèvement à l'atelier après réception du payement ou voir condition pour envoi.

> AMBASSADOR PACK - 50 PREMIERS [ 89€ ]

Pour les 50 premiers qui le commandent...
• Tu reçois la BD «Les souvenirs d’Azvaltya», numérotée et signée en fin de campagne
• Tu reçois une tablette de chocolat personnalisée, au choix
• Tu reçois un t-shirt, au choix (dans la limite des stocks disponibles)
• Tu reçois 20 minicartes pour faire connaître le travail d’Alain
• Tu reçois les minicartes en version digitale pour les partager sur internet
• Tu reçois l’Artbook de la campagne avec du contenu exclusif (esquisses et commentaires de l’auteur) en version digitale
• Tu reçois le dossier de presse Auderset en version digitale pour faire connaître le travail d’Alain aux médias de ta région
• Tu reçois les autres avantages des COMMUNITY PACK et PACK GOUTTE D’EAU


Enlèvement à l'atelier après réception du payement ou voir condition pour envoi.

> SUPPORT PACK  [ 149€ ]

Les arcanes d’Azvaltya s’ouvrent à toi...
• Tu reçois la BD «Les souvenirs d’Azvaltya», numérotée et signée en fin de campagne
• Tu reçois un tirage exclusif A4 Collector (limité à 500 ex.) sur papier de qualité, numéroté et signé, issu de l’univers graphique d’Azvaltya
• Tu reçois l’Artbook Collector (limité à 500 ex.) de la campagne avec 16 pages de contenu exclusif (esquisses et commentaires de l’auteur)
• Tu reçois 20 minicartes pour faire connaître le travail d’Alain
• Si tu fais partie des 80 premiers inscrits, tu bénéficieras d’une invitation VIP lors de la soirée d’inauguration du 28 octobre!
• Tu reçois les autres avantages des COMMUNITY PACK et PACK GOUTTE D’EAU


Fourni avec un certificat de propriété. Enlèvement à l'atelier après réception du payement ou voir condition pour envoi.

> COLLECTION pack [ 10 BD ]  [ 279€ ]

La collection complète des BD Auderset (10 albums)...
• Tu reçois la BD «Les souvenirs d’Azvaltya», numérotée et signée en fin de campagne, ainsi que TOUTES les autres BD publiées par Alain Auderset à ce jour (au total 10 albums)!
• Tu reçois un tirage exclusif A4 Collector (limité à 500 ex.) sur papier de qualité, numéroté et signé, issu de l’univers graphique d’Azvaltya
• Tu reçois l’Artbook Collector (limité à 500 ex.) de la campagne avec 16 pages de contenu exclusif (esquisses et commentaires de l’auteur)
• Tu reçois 20 minicartes pour faire connaître le travail d’Alain
• Si tu fais partie des 80 premiers inscrits, tu bénéficieras d’une invitation VIP lors de la soirée d’inauguration du 28 octobre!
• Tu reçois les autres avantages des COMMUNITY PACK et PACK GOUTTE D’EAU

> PACK DEDICACE  [ 349€ ]

Le pack personnalisé...
• Tu reçois la BD «Les souvenirs d’Azvaltya», numérotée et signée en fin de campagne, assortie d’une dédicace personnalisée (selon l’inspiration du moment ou de tes interactions avec la communauté) • Tu reçois un tirage exclusif A4 Collector (limité à 500 ex.) sur papier de qualité, numéroté et signé, issu de l’univers graphique d’Azvaltya
• Tu reçois l’Artbook Collector (limité à 500 ex.) de la campagne avec 16 pages de contenu exclusif (esquisses et commentaires de l’auteur)
• Tu reçois 20 minicartes pour faire connaître le travail d’Alain
• Si tu fais partie des 80 premiers inscrits, tu bénéficieras d’une invitation VIP lors de la soirée d’inauguration du 28 octobre!
• Tu reçois les autres avantages des COMMUNITY PACK et PACK GOUTTE D’EAU

 

> PACK DEDICACE Fondue  [ 499€ ]

Viens chercher ton PACK DEDICACE à St-Imier, lors d’une soirée détente avec toute l’équipe de l’Atelier!
• Tu participes à une soirée-repas en ton honneur
• Tu reçois la BD «Les souvenirs d’Azvaltya» numérotée et signée, assortie d’une dédicace personnalisée (selon l’inspiration du moment ou de tes interactions avec la communauté)
• Tu reçois un tirage exclusif A4 Collector (limité à 500 ex.) sur papier de qualité, numéroté et signé, issu de l’univers graphique d’Azvaltya
• Tu reçois l’Artbook Collector (limité à 500 ex.) de la campagne avec 16 pages de contenu exclusif (esquisses et commentaires de l’auteur) • Tu reçois 20 minicartes pour faire connaître le travail d’Alain
• Si tu fais partie des 80 premiers inscrits, tu bénéficieras d’une invitation VIP lors de la soirée d’inauguration du 28 octobre!
• Tu reçois les autres avantages des COMMUNITY PACK et PACK GOUTTE D’EAU

> NOUVELLE ANTENNE AUDERSET [ 1299€ ]

100 BD pour pouvoir assurer le stock dans ton église, ton ONG, ton festival, ta ville, ton pays... Une page du site sera dédiée à la liste des distributeurs et tu y seras mentionné!

> Mécène [ 2500€ et + ]

Ce pack comprend un repas avec l’équipe et une discussion avec Alain pour connaître les besoins de l’Atelier que tu souhaiterais couvrir avec ton don.

story:
Star Cross Comics Presents..................

Introducing The Tribulation Taskforce!

The Bible tells of a coming period of great turmoil, referred to by many as the End of Days. 
​
The soon to come antichrist is on a mission to bring forth the last days before the appointed time. Under a platform of world peace, he uses his position in the United Nations to assemble a team of Super powered warriors to help him achieve his true goal, the destruction of mankind.
 

God calls a young man named Hector (aka Grok)  to find the Apostle John, who has never died, and is being held captive at the Vatican. 

Together they will assemble the greatest Superhero force the world has ever seen.  
​They are   THE TRIBULATION TASKFORCE!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

After the great cleansing, all of the Christians were removed from the earth, and humanity was left to pick up the pieces. Some of the remnant Jews, now evangelists of the messiah found some journals from the former leader of the tribulation force. These are Grok’s private journals and materials that he used to train new TT members.

Secret Files contains stories, biographies and selections from our leader Grok's journal.

  

REWARD TIERS

story:
ARTISTS 

  Casey + Violet will be a collaboration between two extremely talented artists: writer, Q'ayyim Mckoy and illustrator, George Wylesol. 

   Q'ayyim is a writer and an imaginist: he creates vivid worlds, intriguing characters, and compelling narratives. From police brutality, feminism, and relationships are issues/topics that encourage him to create impactful stories. He writes for all ages and creates to inspire others to have fun and to enjoy life! 

   George is an illustrator, designer, writer from Philadelphia, living and working in Baltimore. George's piece ghost 2  was featured in the flip design group show in Tromsø,Norway at the Norwegian center for Design and Architecture showcase. George's comic book entitled, The Rabbit, was recently accepted into the Society of Illustrators Comic and Cartoon Art annual. He created the album cover for Wetbrain, Alien Fellowship. George has a collection of original short stories and illustrations entitled, Pink. He has created various logos for bands, programs, and companies. George is an amazing artist and respected among the independent art community. (*Checkout his work in the Gallery section) 


JUNGLE CITY

   Jungle City is a stunning world and the home to millions of animal-humanoids: the morning sun reflects across the windows of skyscrapers, millions of legs walk to their destinations, trains proceed to dispatch, textbook pages open as lecture begins, vehicle horns ring loudly as traffic fills the streets, flower petals dance through the swift breeze ....

  As the night sky falls the stars begin to illuminate, schools close, nightclubs thrive, street lights change as it directs traffic, food trucks open and immediately the lovely aroma fills the air, festival goers enjoy local shows, but under this great city an unexpected evil begins to rise.



CHARACTER BIOS

CASEY WILLIAMS:

   A cheetah-humanoid male, single, 23: graduated from Jungle View with a 3.2 G.P.A and was honored the "Thriving Writer" award (*awarded to the top five students) from Jungle View. Casey also was a Track & Field icon with setting 88 records. But he didn't want to be known as a phenomenal athlete but instead as a profound writer (*under the alias Eddie Jackson) because of his dislike of fame.


   After graduating, he pursued a career not in athletics but as a journalist at the New Land Magazine (*the top magazine company in Jungle City). He was noticed by Editor, Athena Jackson (*x12 "Scroll Artistry" award winner) on his article about strong female leaders who are the driving force for equity in society. After two years of producing and focusing on real issues, Casey was awarded the "New Sensational Writer" award and he strives to receive a "Scroll Artistry" award (*in doing so he will become the youngest to receive the award).


VIOLET SINGLETON:

   A Samoyed-humanoid female, single, 21: from the outer region of the city. Violet was raised by her grandparents because her parents were killed in a car crash when she was 10 years old. After graduating from high school, Violet set her sight on her career as a DJ. After hosting her first live show, she was approached by a local talent recruiter from Green Lava Records and was signed.


   Violet was noticed and featured on the Steez Magazine  as one of the rising talents of the Golden Wave music scene. She was slated to perform at the "Splish-Splash Festival" but she realize that she will have to come up with a sum of $2,500. But Green Lava Records will not grant her money for performing at the festival because they can't afford outer region shows. So Violet decides to work as a waitress at the Taste-Rocket Pizzeria.


LAUREN JONES (*aka MOMMA COOKIE):

   A Leopard-humanoid female, some what divorced, 37: Lauren was a well-known spokeswoman who hosted the "Supreme Talk Show". She would discuss ways to accomplish life goals, encouraging words, and spiritual beliefs with her very passionate viewers. All seemed well for Lauren's career, but her marriage with her Mountain Goat husband became very rough. Her husband began to abuse and threaten her. One day when she hosted her shows, open phone conversation segment, her husband cursed her out but Lauren kept her composure. When Lauren came back home after her show, her husband greeted her with a bat and beat her with it. Through her struggles to call the police she was overcome with rage and fought back, she grabbed the bat from her husband and broke it with her bare hands. Her husband was so in shock he froze and Lauren slit his throat with her razor-sharp claws.


   Although, Lauren killed her husband in self-defense she still was sentenced to (2) years in prison. Her talk show was canceled but for some reason her viewers hoped she would return. While she spent her prison time, she was introduced into a new way of thinking. This new way of thinking was called the "Old Religion". She became a true believer of the old religion. So when she was released from prison, she set out to connect with her old viewers and preach the old religion to them. Her main objective is to discover the truth about the origins of the old religion and to dominate and brain wash the people of Jungle City.


THE BLACK CLOUD:

   A cult organization with the main goal to show the people of Jungle City the importance of the old religion. The cult host ceremonies from the depths of Jungle City's sewers and is ran by their deadly leader, Momma Cookie. The Black Cloud is becoming stronger as they gain more members by their brainwashing methods. The cults plan to take over Jungle City was sparked after a thought-provoking article was written about them surfaced. So the Black Cloud decides to attack the New Land magazines headquarters to spread their word of the old religion.



CASEY + VIOLET SYNOPSIS

   Casey meets a beautiful woman named, Violet, as he awaits to be served his food at a pizzeria. Among him witnessing the possible wonders of their future relationship, he saw the possible problems as well. Violet is on the last hour of her shift as Casey places his order, and they continue to talk for a while and strike a kinship. Violet invites him to come to a show later that night. After an internal debate, he decides that he can't miss an opportunity to get to know this girl. He accepts her offer, has a great time, and engages in further discussion with Violet. She notices but overlooks his demeanor because she believes him to just be nervous. She asks him to have another get together.

    They build a relationship from this and begin dating, but Violet is still working in order to save enough money to attend the "Splish-Splash Festival" and showcase her skills as a DJ and performer. There, Casey runs into an old college buddy who has joined a cult recently. This surprises Casey, but piques his interest as well. When they return from the festival, the relationship hits a rocky path. While Casey constantly chases down leads, Violet is booking more and more gigs.
​
    The cult Black Cloud is becoming stronger as they gain members by the hour. Casey becomes a target for the cult after he writes a thought-provoking article about the cult's unusual practices. Casey's article sparks their interest to attack the New Land magazine headquarters and spread their word of the old religion. So Casey and Violet team up to save Jungle City from the Black Cloud, and it's deadly leader, Momma Cookie.



HELPFUL CONTRIBUTIONS

   Your helpful contributions will help two awesome artists have the opportunity to collaborate with each other and to create great art. Funds will also cover marketing and advertising. Other funds will also cover publishing, museum, & festival submission fees. All of your contributions will be gladly appreciated. 
  • $1,000 (paying illustrator for his services, original artwork, full completion of the comic book)
  • $300 (marketing and advertisement)
  • $200 (submissions to various publishing companies, museum & festivals)

PUBLISHING COMPANIES: 

IMAGE COMICS
DARK HORSE
HEAVY METAL
LIQUID COMICS

MUSEUMS & FESTIVALS:

SOCIETY OF ILLUSTRATORS
LONDON'S CONTEMPORARY ILLUSTRATION EVENT
ORLANDO MUSEUM OF ART


GO SHARE 

   If you're not able to donate please feel free to share our IndieGoGo and also stay tuned for new photos/videos and updates on our progress. 


Thank you so much for helping, love you all!

story:
We will be printing...

"Seamus and Abbie: Phase One"

 

TO READ BEFORE PLEDGING, PLEASE VISIT THE COMIC'S OFFICIAL WEBSITE: www.seamusandabbie.com

*you can also visit the following websites affiliated with the comic*

Spiderforest

Tapastic

Patreon

Facebook

Twitter

 

"WHAT TO EXPECT"

 

"What's this thing about?"

"Seamus and Abbie" is a black-and-white slice of life/dramedy web-comic series that centers around a a thirty-one year old Irish-man named Seamus O'Doherty who suffers from clinical depression, and his equally depressed cat, Abigail.

Follow these two as they 'go through the motions' in their hometown of Dublin, Ireland. Not only battling his own personal demons, Seamus must put up with his large, eccentric family after moving back home from his break up with the love of his life.

All Seamus wants to do is drink his coffee and write sad poetry in solace, but it seems impossible with all of his constantly buzzing negative thoughts.

Seamus is a severely misunderstood, good man going through trying times with a dreary cat on his shoulder...from coffee refills to heart-ache... laughter to self-evaluation, this is one story you won't soon forget.

 

"Why should I invest in a 'Slice-of-Life' comic? Sounds pretty ordinary to me..."

"Seamus and Abbie" is a web-comic I have been creating since 2014, and has gained a very special place in my heart...more than I initially thought it ever would. This story is more than just a simple comic, but rather one in which readers tend to become totally emotionally invested in the characters. You'll laugh, you may cry, or you may even do both at once. Either way, this comic will definitely put a smile on your face.

I fully understand how new-comers to this story may think the plot of "Seamus and Abbie" seems somewhat 'ordinary' when staring at it from a distance, but once you indulge in the story, it's a book you will most likely get through in one sitting! Seamus and his family have a worth-while history, and one that is not for the faint of heart or easily disturbed. Whether you like comedies, tragedies, a good mix of both, or even just a good read, it's a comic you certainly won't regret adding to your book-shelf, since you have most likely experienced at least one of the tragedies represented in the story.

 

"The Message"

One thing that is important to remember about this story is that it centers around a man with depression, but is not about depression itself. This book centers around his daily battles with work, family, heart-break; all while having this annoying dark cloud over his head. Having this illness doesn't define him, but is something he must live with everyday. Seamus has black hair, enjoys dark-roasted coffee, and works at an accounting firm. He likes to read in his favorite pair of glasses and woolen socks before bed. 

But he frequently gets sad. And that's okay.

 

"Content warning before you pledge...it may be cartoons, but..."

While "Seamus and Abbie" is a very positively influenced comic regarding its overall message, it contains some of the following subject matter that everyone thinking of pledging should be fully aware of...full disclosure, here.

Comic Rating: (Young Adult & Up)

  • Trigger Warnings: Medical Tragedies
  • Psychologically Distressing Themes
  • Pro-Views Regarding Sexuality and Racial Equality
  • Consistent Swearing

 

"I need more details on the book..."

The book will consist of the full"Phase One" collection of comic strips. This collection includes strips dating back from 2014 to 2017. Stylistic changes/improvement are prevalent and have not been edited, excluding a clean up and additional formatting for the printed version.

(I take pride in this fact as I personally enjoyed seeing the story's evolution, both in regards to story and the evolution of my characters' physical characteristics).

 

Printing with BLURB.

 

I have gone with the printing  company, Blurb, for getting these books out to the public.

They will be  hard-cover/ image wrapped '8 x 10' inches, printed in 'Economy Color,' on white, uncoated paper. I believe this fits the 'dry' theme of the comic perfectly. I will be ordering a sample book to show backers and to have for my pre-approval before distributing the 'real deals,' which will have the completed/accurate 'Tributes' section once this campaign is done running its course...for the time being, here is a rough example of what to expect...

 

PAGE FORMAT FOR COMIC STRIPS [EXAMPLE]:

 

Most of the comic strips take up more than one page, but are grouped together appropriately. Each strip will be titled.

 

"Rewards Examples"

REWARDS [KEYCHAINS EXAMPLE]:

 

[PET/OWNER PORTRAITS EXAMPLE]:

 

"What if I have questions and/or concerns? Will you listen?"

Absolutely, I will! One of my favorite parts of the creative process is listening to fans/readers' concerns. I want to stay in touch to get you exactly what you deserve from pledging to my efforts of creating my dream book! If any concerns arise from you, feel free to contact me here, on my website, listed social media, or via my business email: 

izziross@outlook.com

 

"What if I would like more than one book, or would like more than the listed amount of rewards?"

Reward items do not vary from their specified tier groups. Requests will not be accepted. An official 'Shop' has not been set up yet on seamusandabbie.com, but will be created in the months after this campaign ends (TBD).

(Physical donations are also welcomed, so long as you can meet me in person, as I understand this is a preference for some).

 

"UPDATES TAB KEEP-UP"

During the ENTIRE month of this campaign, I will be posting a fun incentive podcast activity under the 'Updates' tab! So if you pledge, make sure to check up on this tab weekly if not more frequently! I'll also be posting celebratory sketches based on goal marks we hit every other day or so... Here's what you'll see...

 

"IndieGogo Campaign Podcast: 'I Get Seamus"

I will be hosting an 'Indie-Gogo campaign-exclusive' podcast for the full month! This is a very exciting endeavor, and will be a nice way of keeping in touch with everyone who is contributing to the printing of the books, or are contemplating it but need an extra PUSH!

This podcast will be called "IndieGogo Campaign Podcast: 'I Get Seamus."  It will feature every-day people (also readers of the comic) from all over the spectrum of life who have been diagnosed with depression. They will give their takes on it in a 15-20 minute interview, where they will tell their story in a nut-shell, how they cope, and what advice they would like to give to others who have the illness. Lastly, they will talk about how they can relate to the comic and add fun facts pin-pointing why they read the story and enjoyed it before the podcast ends. These episodes will feature the same questions, but with different guests each time, which will hopefully be informative and inspiring to other viewers with depression, or for those who would like to understand more about it.

Podcast Episodes:

#1 - August 1, 2017

 
#2 - August 4, 2017
 

#3 - August 14, 2017

 

 

"CONCLUSION"

With any questions you feel I did not answer, please message me directly.

Be sure to check out the video I have uploaded for more detail into the story and what you will be signing up for!

I thank everyone who will be going along this journey with me! It means so much, and I am eternally grateful.

Much love to my readers and supporters,

-IZZI
