story:
What is Anonymi Press?

Anonymi Press is the name of a small publishing company founded and headed by Christopher Ducharme. The company was established in 2012 for the purpose of self-publishing his own comic books and graphic novels.

Christopher has been an artist and avid comic lover since his youth, always dreaming of one day creating the same magic that captivated his own imagination. All through high school he spent hours dreaming up new worlds and characters, putting them in sticky situations that they would then need to find ways out of. Finally, entering adulthood, he put those imaginings on paper in the form of his first graphic story - the Tempest Moon.

In the summer of 2012, Anonymi launched it's first Indie Go Go campaign and successfully raised $500 from the campaign and $300 from personal contributors - successfully printing 100 copies of the first volume of the Tempest Moon.

Anonymi is once again seeking help in launching not just the next step in Sarah's fantasy adventure, but the next short comic series in the Anonymi repitoire. Christopher has been working with Spencer Campbell to illustrate a super power story about political corruption and cival war - a short comic series titled the Fallen.

By funding Anonymi Presses campaign, you will be helping contribute to the printing and shipping costs associated with the publication of the Tempest Moon volume 2 and the first issue of the Fallen, as well as costs associated with reprinting and shipping additional copies of the Tempest Moon volume 1.

Our goal and your reward

Anonymi is requesting approximately $2000 to sustain the print-on-demand business partnership that the Press has with the comic printing company Ka-Blam! (http://ka-blam.com/printing/front/).

  • Why Print-on-Demand?

It's simple - as a small time publishing company, self funding is limited to the owners personal income, contributions via funding campaign and profits made through the sales of the books. With the limited resources and exposure, it is more cost efficient to print when the demand is needed.

 

  • What's in it for you?

By helping fund Anonymi, you will be eligible to receive copies of the books being offered under the Anonymi library, including the Tempest Moon volume's 1 and 2 (reduced from the actual cover price) and the Fallen #1. All books provided in fulfillment to this campaign will be signed (and personalized upon request).

Each book will be bagged and boarded, sealed with a custom Anonymi Press label and mailed - details on shipping practices to be determined.

A raffle will also be done for 1 of 3 original art peices - represented by each of the 3 books to be printed. A random drawing of contributors will be made. Winners of the drawing will be notified via email. Artwork will be drawn on 11x8.5 inch Bristol paper and mailed with the perk items provided from contributing.

 

  • What will the funding go toward?

Anonymi is hoping to raise $2000, which will help fully fund the printing costs of all 3 publications.

Last year, an order of 100 copies of Tempest Moon was printed, costing:

Total Order: $729.96 ( Printing $505.00 + S&H $224.96 )

Keep in mind the cost to print a single book is dependant on the number of pages, materials and other specifications provided by Ka-Blam! In turn, the shipping costs are relevent to the number of books shipped and the weight of said books.

 

  • Break down of costs:

Tempest Moon vol. 1 (100 copies) = $729.96

Tempest Moon vol. 2 (100 copies) = $729.96+ (may cost more as there are more pages in vol. 2 than were in vol. 1)

The Fallen issue # 1 (100-200 copies) =$154.00 - $329.00 + shipping (TBD at time of shipping)

We are also taking the care to individually board and bag each book. Boards and bags run approximately $10 for 100 (of each) - effectively costing $20 to board and bag 100 books. Considering we're looking to print 300-400 books, this is an additional cost that must be considered.

 

Total cost: $1888.92 approxmiately.

(For a more more in depth look on how Ka-Blam! works their pricing, please visit http://ka-blam.com/printing/index.php?page=Calculator&op=36)

 

The Products:

Click on the images for a drop box preview.

 

Volume 1...

Sarah likes to think she's a fairly normal girl. Being completely obsessed with books, she tends to immerse herself into fictional worlds about wizards and magic instead of dealing with reality. So when a stranger appears asking to speak to her father, she decides to dig into her parents past to find out who the mysterious man is.

She finds herself in the attic digging through her mothers old belongings, only to discover a book with strange markings and symbols. Being plunged into a dark secret of her mothers past, followed by a domino effect of unfolding events, she is left with a thought, shadowed by doubt...

Magic is real.

Volume 2... (no preview available at this time)

The warlock has been released...

Sarah was a normal girl, living a bland life in a rural town. When a stranger appears asking for her father and a mysterious book appears in her attic, she is confronted with trouble at every turn. Now her brother is in grave danger and a maniacal warlock walks the Earth. Worst yet, he may not be the real threat. With new friends in tow, can they defeat the warlock before the next full moon? With her entire world crashing down around her, she still lives in doubt about her parents unknown past and a troubled thought, shadowed by doubt...

Magic is real.

 

The Tempest Moon is the debut graphic series by Christopher Ducharme, about a teenaged girl who learns of a dark secret hidden for years by her parents. She is thrust into a world she never imagined existed - a world dominated by elmental magic. But The Tempest Moon is more than an urban fantasy tale about a girl who learns to manipulate magic to defeat an evil warlock - it is a coming of age tale, a story that concretes the foundation of friends and family and the ultimate concept of forgiving those close to you.

 

"The world of comics needs more creators with the passion to make something from nothing and the willingness to get the story out by any means nessecary.  What you are reading is the first step, not only of a group of characters but of a creator.  I for one, look forward to the journey."

-GMB Chomichuk - author and illustrator of the Imagination Manifesto (http://www.comicalchemy.blogspot.ca/)

 

" A fast-paced tale that keeps you guessing, combined with unique, endearing characters, The Tempest Moon is sure to hook you from the start. I am definitely looking forward to reading more!"
 
-Tara Abbamondi, author of Puddles (http://www.tarabba.com/)
 
 
 

In a politically corrupt dystopia, one man with unnatural powers sets off to punish those in power. But what if he's not the only one with powers? Who will save the city of The Fallen?

Suggested for mature readers.

The Fallen is the second series offered by Anonymi - Illustrated by Christopher Ducharme and written by Spencer Campbell, the Fallen is a super hero story unlike any other - in the fact that those with super powers are not here to save the day. The powers are used to fulfill their own agenda's. It's a crude, bloody battle from the word go.

 

 

The Goal Can Be Met With Your Help!

If by chance you are in a position that you cannot contribute, fear not! There is still much you can do to help out.

1. Help spread the word. There is a lot of people out there who are passionate about comics. If you're an avid twitter user, then this isn't news to you. A huge contribution would come from sharing this page on twitter, facebook, tumblr and any other social media outlet. Word of mouth can spread like wild fire with the right approach. Help get the fire started!

2. The creator is exploring ways to provide digital copies of his pulications as well. With digital copies available, it will exponentially increase the availability of Anonymi's library and increase the companies reach. If you have any experience or any information on the best practices, resources or advice, drop him an email at christopher.mjducharme@gmail.com

 

Should you have any additional questions, feel free to email Christopher at the email above.

 

Additional links:

Follow along with Anonymi on facebook! https://www.facebook.com/AnonymiPress

Follow Christopher on twitter @projectanonymus

story:
Our Story

We are trying to raise production costs for a new comic book written by James Leary. Most of you may know James as Clem, from the Buffy The Vampire Slayer TV show. What you don't know about James is that he is also a VERY talented writer and has always wanted to write a comic book! This comic book will mark his debut with many more to come! James has written a story titled Wolf Mother. The story is being pencilled by the enigmatic fan favorite, Mitch Byrd. Mitch has a talent with a pencil that no other can compare to. Mitch is known for such great comics as Robocop, Predator, Starship Troopers, Green Lantern, Spawn, and various others. His fantastic art style makes James' story really come to life. The covers to this book are being done by Steve Scott. Steve is known for pencilling Batman, JLA, and most recently Kirby Genesis Captain Victory. He has also worked on numerous TV and movie related projects such as Smallville, Kyle XY and Batman The Dark knight. He is also featured in the upcoming Justice League: Doom DVD.


The Impact

If for some reason, the funds needed aren't generated, we will still produce this book with all of the incentives sent out to our contributors.


What We Need & What You Get

We need $3000 to produce this book. This is a dream project for all involved and we are determined to bring it to fruition!


Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this with everyone and post it wherever you can. We really want to see this book done in a way that it deserves to be! WARNING!: The cover art to the variant issue of this book may not be appropriate for all ages

story:
Buckey's Ready to Ride With You!

Money is needed for development of three additional original Buckey characters: Cornelius, Scorpico and Varmoosh, as well as to help pay for expert advisors and coders who can implement accessiblity for hearing, computer readers, electronic comic strips, sound games, keyboarding and touch screen dynamics. Buckey's robot-comic companions will be exclusive to Buckey Bronco Stories (and at this point everything is original, handcrafted and exclusive to the internet). 

Buckey Bronco Evolution, Phase I

This is a three prong request:  Money is needed to pay more sophisticated programmers to assist author with the completion of Buckey's friends Cornelius, Varmoosh and Scorpico as well as layout for his cell phone app which will include his first comic: Buckey Bronco and the Fastbuck Five, (and define coding draft for his big game-app: Spy Into Cornelius' Mountain).  Buckey's first comic will include accessibility fine tuning, advanced keyboarding, linguistics, kids-learning, protected login, advanced encryption and cookieless-play.  

Buckey Bronco Evolution, Phase II

If all goes well Buckey will be back to raise additional funds for his Christmas  comic (and draft his second game-app: Space Globs). Any Money earned will be recycled into legal fees, trademarking and patent (further copyrights) accounting costs, as well as costs to travel to Indian land in California, Nevada and Arizona in search of indigenous toys and dolls.

Buckey Bronco Evolution, Phase III

With two electronic comics and one game on the loose, Buckey's sales should pick up.  If not, Buckey plans to take the east coast by storm.  In autumn he will travel to a US toy manufacturing plant in Pennsylvania in search of  toymakers and potential railroad vendors, to bundle in with his apps. At Phase III a new investor proposal will be submitted for all to review.

App Developer - Children's Comics and Games - safer applications with more parental involvement and less cookies!  For a draft showing of its original graphics and full author-bios go to: http://www.buckeybronco.us

  • If you're an "office Mom" Buckey is the perfect investment for you.  Moms can become the first to invest in and test these applications during its Buckey Bronco Evolution, Phase I.
  • If you're a "rich Dad" feel free to peer-in on Buckey Bronco as he pioneers across rough desert terrain with his BFFs Scorpico, Varmoosh, wild horses, Mariachi, witches and Indians!

Author Credited 1975-Present - Screenwriter: The Girl Gets Moe (Goldbar Entertainment, 1997) (sold and renamed by HBO); Liberty and Bash (Myrl Schreibman, 1989).  Lyrics: teenage lyricist for the rock band Jefferson Starship (1970s).  Gold Records Awards, including cover model on Jefferson Starship's Modern Times (1981).

Creative Assistant - Director’s Assistant on the film Colors (Orion Pictures, 1988); and a costume/wardrobe stylist-assistant for the Coultier Agency.

Volunteer, I contributed to the stabilization of Los Angeles during its “drug rehab” growth spurt of the early 1980s. At twenty-one, I began frequenting skid row, hospitals, prisons, lockdowns and institutes to discuss the dangers of drug and alcohol abuse. I continued volunteering in this way until late 2009.

Children’s Theater/Costumes - I was the contributing lead costume coordinator for the children’s musical, “Zola’s Footprint” - a Marin County, Ross Valley Yes! extravaganza circa. 2008.

Buckey's Camp!

Coffee cup engineers will love Buckey Bronco! It's a start-up completely exclusive to the internet and our hand held devices. 

  • The funds will go as stated above, as well as to basic living expenses (artist/designer) illustrations, legal fees, work-for-hires, access experts, engineers, vendor joins and other registrations.
  • If there's enough money raised from our first comic book and application (Spy Into) then we move to Buckey Bronco Evolution Phase II -- Space Globs.

The Long Haul

The ultimate goal of Buckey Bronco is to travel into distressed regions and help other people build websites and cell phone applications or set up virtual offices:

Buckey has his sights on Nevada as his first office location. Once his office is up and running other Buckey pioneers will man the deck while he travels to another region.

I started writing as a teenager, with lyrical credits on par with rock royalty.

I spent my twenties and thirties as a volunteer, helping others.  I love costumes, textile, computers, music and visually rich stories.

Wanted

  • Directors, illustrators, vendors for candy and games, mappers, virtual software safety experts, moms and dads! Game Land owners! Toy manufacturers! Server space! Cell phone manufacturers!  Buckey Bronco is your spot!

story:
I am KP Crayon (Karen Parish) an up and coming Christian/Clean Comedienne.  I have discovered the joy of stand up comedy.  The above video shows my very first ever performance.  I have been told that I was funny all of my life, but I never actually considered comedy to be a vocational option for me...until now.  After my first performance, I received lots of positive feedback, and doors have begun to open for me. 

I wish I could describe for you the energy that I feel when standing before a crowd, and making them laugh.  With so many unfunny things going on in the world, I find that people are looking for an outlet to laugh and have a good time.  I have chosen clean comedy because I  think people, just like me, want to enjoy evenings out with the entire family...kids and all.

Things have been moving at lightening speed for me, and I am being presented with amazing opportunities to work with other comics from across the country.  My gift is definitely making room for me, but it is not quite making board, as in room and board. As a new comedienne, I am still in the "pay your dues" stage, so I am being paid in mostly exposure and love tokens.

Since Fresno, CA is not really a hotbed of entertainment, most of my opportunities are in either northern or southern California.  Rather than miss out on my moment, I am seeking sponsors to help me take my gift to the masses.   

All donations will be used for travel expenses, and convention fees.  I have the opportunity to attend the first ever Females in Comedy Convention which will be held at the end of this month...that is why I only have 10 days to raise the funds.

 

The Impact

Your contribution just may change my life.  I know that I have natural talent to make people laugh.  I have been in contact with a producer who is going to help me put together a one woman comedic play about my life.  My real testimony is coming soon.  It is powerful, and will help many people.  I now know that it was all part of God's plan. I want to continue to network and learn all facets of the business, so that I will put out a quality product.  I am destined to color the world with laughter; can I count on you to help me do it?

Other Ways You Can Help

I know that money is tight everywhere (I have a high school senior girl at home), and some folks will not be able to donate. If you can't make a donation, please spread the message to someone who just might be able to.  if you can't do that, then please just pray for me.  God can and God will.

Thanks for your consideration,

KP Crayon

Color Your Wourld With Love and Laughter
story_txt:
I am KP Crayon (Karen Parish) an up and coming Christian/Clean Comedienne.  I have discovered the joy of stand up comedy.  The above video shows my very first ever performance.  I have been told that I was funny all of my life, but I never actually considered comedy to be a vocational option for me...until now.  After my first performance, I received lots of positive feedback, and doors have begun to open for me. 
I wish I could describe for you the energy that I feel when standing before a crowd, and making them laugh.  With so many unfunny things going on in the world, I find that people are looking for an outlet to laugh and have a good time.  I have chosen clean comedy because I  think people, just like me, want to enjoy evenings out with the entire family...kids and all.
Things have been moving at lightening speed for me, and I am being presented with amazing opportunities to work with other comics from across the country.  My gift is definitely making room for me, but it is not quite making board, as in room and board. As a new comedienne, I am still in the "pay your dues" stage, so I am being paid in mostly exposure and love tokens.
Since Fresno, CA is not really a hotbed of entertainment, most of my opportunities are in either northern or southern California.  Rather than miss out on my moment, I am seeking sponsors to help me take my gift to the masses.   

All donations will be used for travel expenses, and convention fees.  I have the opportunity to attend the first ever Females in Comedy Convention which will be held at the end of this month...that is why I only have 10 days to raise the funds.
 

The Impact
Your contribution just may change my life.  I know that I have natural talent to make people laugh.  I have been in contact with a producer who is going to help me put together a one woman comedic play about my life.  My real testimony is coming soon.  It is powerful, and will help many people.  I now know that it was all part of God's plan. I want to continue to network and learn all facets of the business, so that I will put out a quality product.  I am destined to color the world with laughter; can I count on you to help me do it?


Other Ways You Can Help
I know that money is tight everywhere (I have a high school senior girl at home), and some folks will not be able to donate. If you can't make a donation, please spread the message to someone who just might be able to.  if you can't do that, then please just pray for me.  God can and God will.
Thanks for your consideration,
KP Crayon
Color Your Wourld With Love and Laughter

story:
Hello!

Some of you may know me personally and some of you may know me from roles that I have played on screen. Well, I am so excited to introduce you to a wonderful project that I have been working on the last couple of months. CeCe in Harlem is the children's book series that I created which accompanies a musical I wrote called HARLEM! I am proud to announce our first book, "Presenting CeCe's Big Break" has broken through and already a success amongst young readers and their parents.

The series follows CeCe, a chorus girl a big-eyed dreamer,during the Harlem Renaissance. A laundress by day and a Cotton Club chorus girl by night, CeCe has big dreams. Her dream become a reality when she meets Billy, a scout who discovers her and takes her to Broadway.

It only takes that one moment for your life to change right?

There's a little bit of CeCe in all of us.

What We Need & What You Get

Aforementioned, we launched our first book via e-book and it is available through Amazon, I-tunes, and Nook. Right now our aim is to get our book into print.

Not going through a publisher, creates a cost inflation we cant cover so we need your help. No matter how much we make, we will use it to print our books. Even if its 3.

The Impact

There are very few children's books for girls of color that remind them of their beauty and talents. Our book showcases characters from different nationalities, which is reflective of the diverse world we live in. Your contribution will mean that we get a chance to push other stories into the mainstream.

We have sold 50 books via e-book which for us is a GREAT start.

Some of you might know that I volunteer with an after-school tutoring organization called 826la. They have graciously offered to host a book launch where a portion of the proceeds will go towards the non-profit.

Other Ways You Can Help

We need to get the word out there that we are sitting  on this hidden gem. CeCe is a character that will be around for long time, so if there is any means to promote our story we gladly will appreciate it!
 
- PR releases
- Word of Mouth
- Book Clubs
 
Additional updates can be viewed at: www.websterstreefilms.com/books
 
Thank you so much and we look forward to making our dream into a reality!

story:
This is the cover of the sketchbook:

Short Summary

Hello my name is Jose Garcia, comic book artist and 2d animator, recently I published my first hardcover book called 'Merch Girl' in which I did the art, working along Josh Blaylock and Murs, the creators, to make Merch Girl book come true.

Recently I wanted to put a personal sketchbook for sale, I have all the materiall but no money to print, thing is I need 1600 dlls to print a small 14.5 x 21 cm sketchbook, with 50 pages , make a small run of 500 books, black and white.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Okay so I need 1600 bucks to make this happen, where is the money going?

1200 bucks are going to print this book

100-200 are going for shipping costs, The printer charges somewhere in between 100 and 200 dllls to send me the book once is finished

100-200 more are going for the perks, printings and shippings

And about 200 to 220 bucks that goes to Indiegogo fees.

If there are leftovers after these those will be my personal gains.

 

 

 So say, isnt 50 pages a bit too small?

well if I can get an extra 340 bucks I could print a book with 70 to 100 pages  and make it worth the money! that would be about 100 to 120 new artwork printed in the book!

 Say, what kind of art are we paying to see?

Well here are some of the stuff planned to be printed, there is a LOT more if you help me ;)

 

The Impact

This is a small project of mine I want to share with the world, get my art in the hands of anyone who whould appreciate it.

If succesfull I'd like to venture furter and start making my own comics, personal projects and creating more and more art and comics for the world to see.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word! Around the internet to your firends! however you want it!

If you manage to get lots of people even if you dont pledge, you can get all perks and stuff, tell your friends to mention you in the comments so you can get to win all the prizes.

Manage to get people to pledge at least 60 dlls and mention you, and you get the signed sketchbook, postcard set, and prints for free! 

 

Perks:

 

 

UPDATE#1

Adventure Time Print Pack #1

4 Adventure Time Print Pack! All this prints for only $30!

story:
THE PERKS.

There are only 200 perks available for this campaign. It does not matter which perk you apply for, they are only numbered to limit the amount off contributors to 200.  Perks will be allocated via the 200 scratchcards. You can purchase more than 1 scratchcard.
Not all bad huh?

Please go to  http://njiri.deviantart.com/journal/42856109/    for a copy of the script describing Denises' metamorphosis if you would like to see the trauma she goes through while changing. This is only the script but as funding comes in, I will be able to pay an artist and will download the artwork to give you a visual perspective of the story. There are also examples of my photoshop and sketch works at  http://njiri.deviantart.com/gallery/

The Synopsis.

Aussie volcanologist Denise gets the ultimate makeover when an unusual alien armguard on a volcanic, Pacific island protects her from the exploding volcano; because to do that it had to amalgamate 3 things; Denise, obsidian sand and its own energy source... fire; turning her into a flickering molten obsidian being.

 

After the trauma of coming to grips with her new self and abilities, she heads off home but loses her way, ending up in L.A. where she finds her unusual powers give her a major edge when it comes to helping L.A’s finest brawl with L.A’s worst.

 

Initially she is THE celeb but as crime dwindles and male interest increases, it becomes more about her and less about how she broke the back of crime in L.A.

 

The jealousy and increasing abuse comes to a climax when she hits her lowest trough of being insulted by a drink-stewed homeless man … ‘That’s bloody done it... now I’m pissed’.

Just before she skewers the unsurprisingly repentant 'gent' however, she gets help in the most unlikely way.

But you'll have to wait for that story.

 

The Logistics.

I do not have an 'in-house artist so the majority of this funding will be used to hire artists, inkers, colourers and letterers. As you know, you do get what you pay for and if these guys are any good... they do not work for peanuts. [Darn, life would be so much easier.]

The balance of the money will be used to publish the comic, distribute said comic to stores and the all-important marketing via – conventions – shows – in-store visuals and of course the printing packaging and postage costs incurred in this campaign.


The Scratchcards terms.

200 scratchcards will be printed and these will be posted randomly to the 200 contributors. All contributions are $30 and the perk you receive will depend entirely on your luck. You could get a digital vector portrait done of a person of your choice with other perks valued at no less than $120.00 all for a $30.00 donation. The very least you could get is your own personalised PDF print of the comic.

All scratchcards will be issued with their characters name under the scratch surface and a visible referernce number. When you reveal your characters name, pse e'mail the reference number/s to me and advise your perk, this will also ensure legitimacy.

If more than100 but less then 200 scratchcards are issued,  any un-issued cards will be complimentary and one will be posted to each individual who purchased more than one scratchcard, the balance will be sent out to random individuals.

If less than 100 scratchcards are issued, the costs of the perks will no longer be justified by the low volumes and the remaining cards will be destroyed. However in this instance, I do guarantee at least 1 digital portrait and 5 original sketches will be awarded in this campaign, the balance will be personalised PDF's of Issue #1. Every contributor will be guaranteed something for their support.

Please do not send home addresses where possible - Post office numbers or business addresses are preferable.

 

The Thanks.

Just left to say thanks to you all in advance and I hope there is something in there that appeals to you... And of course... BEST OF LUCK.

story:
For the first time in hundreds of years, Finn's legend is retold. Forged anew from the breath of the storyteller, but this time it's different... This time the fireside is the modern world. This time, it's in the form of a Graphic Novel. Now you have the chance to become part of that heroic quest, the journey of immortality, by remembering - The Nobility of our Irish Heroes.

Finn McCool was the legendary protector of Ireland and Chief of The Fianna, the elite bodyguard to the High Kings of Ireland. Finn and The Fianna's heroic adventures and deeds are well known within the Irish community and if you reference, Finn McCool, you will see, not only the vast amount of links to his mythology, but also the many pubs, restaurants, organizations and clubs, that celebrate his noble name. What you will not see, is the Graphic Novel of the hero, that, my friends, is about to change. 

The time has come to honour our ancient Irish heroes and in the highest way possible - by putting their fine names on the lips of true clansmen and women the world over. Part of our vision for the novel is for young men and women to read them, as well as adults, to learn more about their heritage, rites of passage and initiations into adulthood, something we feel is sadly lacking in today's world. 

The stories of Finn McCool do just that, they teach. This is part of the drive behind the graphic novel series, also to showcase the real heroes of our past, rather than the constant "Superman v Batman" overkill. This is an original project, a one off, you can be part of this fantastic journey.

We are producing of the Hardcover Original Graphic Novel, featuring the retelling of Finn’s origin. In order to hire the best writers, pencillers, inkers, colourists and letterers in the business to bring this vision to life, we need your support. Our plan is to raise the money to be able to hire top-notch creative talent from the comic and graphic novel field and to partner with an American Comic Book publisher, Archaia, in order to distribute the graphic novel to comic and bookstores across the world.  

       

Above we see Fiacuil, Finn's warrior mentor and the dreaded, Goll Mc Morna, the man who murders Finn's father, a conflict indeed  ...

Above is Saba Priestess of the underworld and Finn's true love. Saba first comes to Finn in the form of a white deer, cursed so by the dark lord of the underworld. Finn lifts the curse and we see here, Saba transformed back into the beautiful woman she is.

Below is the magical druid Finegas, another wise mentor of Finn's. He teaches Finn the value of the earth and the magic that she holds. Finegas also catches the fames, "Salomon of knowledge."

"You've seen the Movies 'Braveheart', 'Rob Roy', 'Highlander' and recently, the Pixar animation, 'Brave'.  All great and have one thing in common; they're Scottish. The magic, power and beauty that is Irish Story and Myth has seemingly been overlooked by Hollywood and the world, but not any longer - Irish legends and its Heroes deserve a place in our hearts with the graphic novel and up on the Big Screen.

Below we see the Boy Finn's first day of warrior initiation with his wild mentor, Fiacuil.

This ground breaking project will lead the way in the reemergence of the Irish Celtic Warrior Heroes. It will become part of your story, your history, not only for you, but for your ancestors. By honouring them, you honour the past, by honouring the past, you become the hero ...

Below we see Finn's first encounter with the magical druid, Finegas.

Together we can forge a new wave of Heroes ... and this time it's IRISH and the Greatest Irish Hero there ever was, Finn McCool. 

Below we see the moment that Finn is forced to face death, in more ways than one ...

     "When you are dust, how will you be remembered?"

By supporting this project you will literally create for yourself, and kin, a lasting legacy that you can feel deeply proud of. Part of what the Finn McCool stories stand for, is the mentoring and initiation of our youth. Providing young people with safe, integral and beautiful settings for them to explore their own personal power, while being mentored onto the pathway of adulthood by trustworthy mentor figures. The producer of the Finn McCool Project, supports the Irish Youth Foundation charity. The mission of IYF is to provide opportunities for children and young people facing adverse and extreme conditions to experience success in their lives. A percentage of profits made from the graphic novel of Finn McCool, will be donated to this inspiring charity based in Dublin, Ireland.


Below are seven images from Courtney Davis' art pack for this campaign. They are copies of original art from the Finn McCool's story. We are offering these as a part of perk donations. Please view listings on the right hand side of the campaign for more details.

        

       

Totally one off and unique ... Should you choose to donate to a perk that comes with a certificate of authenticity, we will do our best to get it to you by Christmas. However, we cannot guarantee the postal system, so we are offering you a downloadable certificate, with your, or the name of the person you are gifting, printed and embossed into the certificate. This will come from our dedicated website, you can then mount or frame the certificate for yourself or a receiver, after all, a part of Irish history is an incredible gift for anyone ...

The first wave of funding gets us out into the world with this incredible story, on the Graphic Novel platform. A completed Screenplay for the first film is here, part two is well underway. "A classic in the action adventure genre, and deserves serious studio consideration." But here's the thing, we don't want to just give it away to the big studios, we want to produce as much of the project as possible with the help of public funding. By doing so, we retain as much of the story's authenticity as we can. From the Graphic Novel, to the big screen. You are invited on that wild journey of creation, we want you to be a part of one of the finest stories to have ever come out of Ireland ... 

        

The images that you are seeing are from the talents of John Walters, known for his Stunning VFX on the latest Spartacus series for the US STARZ channel and Courtney Davis, the world's leading Celtic illustrator. Their artwork will become the imagery for the Graphic Novel. John's with the graphic page layout and Courtney's with his incredible Irish knot-work which brings in the magic of the Celtic world. Each page will carry with it Finn McCool's legend. From his true love Saba, cursed into the form of a white deer and freed by Finn from her entrapment, to Saint Patrick, in dialogue with Oisin, Finn's son, or the wild druid, Finegas and the many more characters that I'm sure you will love, and if its "World of Role Play" you're into, we have some fantastic new characters for you to dream alive.

What lifts Finn McCool's stories above the crowd?  In truth, reality. Scattered across Ireland are dozens of sacred sites that pre-date the coming of christianity and unlike the make believe world of Tolkien's, "The Hobbit" and "The Lord of The Rings" who dwell on "Middle Earth" (a place that does not exist), the sites across Ireland do.  Many of them include the stories of Finn McCool and the elite bodyguard, the Fianna, protectors of the High Kings of ancient Ireland.

  

   All of the funds will go towards the graphic novel's production, the artwork, writing, lettering, colouring, printing, marketing and distribution. Anything you can offer will help. In return we will offer our deepest gratitude in all kinds of unique perks. Please see the perk bar for details. *Please note: Travel and accommodation expenses are not included and postage outside of the USA must be added if you are claiming a perk that requires postage.

What's in a name? There's a very interesting fact about the hero, did you know that there's at least seven different spellings of his name? This has come about over thousands of years, the stories became legends, the legends became myths. Here's the names we know of: Finn McCool ... Fionn Mac Cum Hail ... Finn McCuail ... Fionn McCumhail ... Fyn Mc Cuail ... Fionn McCual ... Finn McCuail. Some say that his name is spelt "Fionn" but that would make it the modern spelling, others say "Finn" the old way. So, what we decided to do was to offer the hero's name so that EVERYBODY can read and pronounce it, an inclusive spelling, hence ... "Finn McCool". Now, for all of the die-hard Gaelic fan's of the hero, we will also be producing a limited edition version, with all of the names, and there are many, spelt in the ancient Irish Gaelic. If that's the copy you'd like, then please just email and let us know. You can do so via this page when you preorder your copy of the graphic novel. 

What happens if we don't reach our total goal? We will continue the project come what may by STARTING, we can still hire the artists and even begin by creating a soft copy of the stories. We want to invite you to become involved, you are our community, our tribe, we believe that you should have the chance to be a part of this exciting reemergence of the Wild Celt. We'll achieve this through the stories of Finn McCool, and the Fianna.  Finn would have wanted it that way. Real People, Real Project, Real Heart ... YOU.

                                      An old Irish saying goes:

So, com'on, let's you and I dream the Heroes alive, let's breathe anew the old, give fire to the wind, and call the gods to task. Our time is Now, we honour our past by becoming the hero, by becoming the Hero, we live the myths...

For more info on this project please visit these related websites:

http://www.Finn-McCool.com

https://www.facebook.com/FinnMcCoolTheMovie

www.artofjohnwalters.com

http://www.courtneydavisart.com

http://www.iyf.ie

Chris Brosnan is the Writer/Producer of the Finn McCool project. Born in the UK where he lived for 40 years, he now lives in Vancouver, Canada with his wife, Karen  and their 3.7 year old son Fionn.

Chris' background is in Film and T.V. production in the UK, as well as writing and performing for the music and stage industry, not only in the UK, but around the world. This has been his passion for over 25 years. Below is a shot of Chris with his son, Fionn, named after the legendary Irish hero Finn McCool ...

Speaking of Irish mythology ... it just wouldn't be right without a real Leprechaun ...

Chris' writing credits include: "Fugitive Fathers", "Wimps To Warriors", "The Shadow Catcher", "Healers", "Gospel According to Elvis", "The Redemption of Man" and "Finn McCool - The Forging of the Fianna." Graphic novel and the feature film screenplay of the same.

"I was first introduced to the legends of Finn McCool from my Grandmother and later from traditional storytellers. His legend has fascinated, not only me, but the people of Ireland and scholars alike the world over for centuries." 

Chris started his film career working alongside the likes of Clint Eastwood, Ron Howard, Kevin Costner and Morgan Freeman, in big budget feature films, learning from the best in movies such as: "Willow", "Robin Hood - Prince of Thieves", "White Hunter- Black Heart", "Batman", and many, many more.

Although Chris started his career as an actor, he found that he preferred the other side of the camera. He became a writer/producer for stage in the early nineties and has also worked on productions for the BBC as well as many Independents.

The natural progression into producing is something Chris is very focussed on, and his passion and energy is on breathing life into this exiting new project.

Chris brings a wealth of experience in the industry, and an extensive book of contacts to the Finn McCool project.

If you are unable to donate, then you can still help us by spreading the word of our campaign to those around you, via Facebook, Twitter, Youtube, emails to friends, contacts and importantly by using the Indiegogo share button at the very top of this page ... YOU CAN MAKE A DIFFERENCE and remember that there's a blessings of magic and luck with every Irish story, so claim yours by supporting the heroes of old.

We will be updating the page as the campaign moves forward with new artwork and news, so keep in touch, send us your blessings, as we do to you ...

May you be blessed in all ways, always ...

For the first time in hundreds of years, Finn's legend is retold. Forged anew from the breath of the storyteller, but this time it's different... This time the fireside is the modern world. This time, it's in the form of a Graphic Novel. Now you have the chance to become part of that heroic quest, the journey of immortality, by remembering - The Nobility of our Irish Heroes.



Finn McCool was the legendary protector of Ireland and Chief of The Fianna, the elite bodyguard to the High Kings of Ireland. Finn and The Fianna's heroic adventures and deeds are well known within the Irish community and if you reference, Finn McCool, you will see, not only the vast amount of links to his mythology, but also the many pubs, restaurants, organizations and clubs, that celebrate his noble name. What you will not see, is the Graphic Novel of the hero, that, my friends, is about to change. 
The time has come to honour our ancient Irish heroes and in the highest way possible - by putting their fine names on the lips of true clansmen and women the world over. Part of our vision for the novel is for young men and women to read them, as well as adults, to learn more about their heritage, rites of passage and initiations into adulthood, something we feel is sadly lacking in today's world. 
The stories of Finn McCool do just that, they teach. This is part of the drive behind the graphic novel series, also to showcase the real heroes of our past, rather than the constant "Superman v Batman" overkill. This is an original project, a one off, you can be part of this fantastic journey.

We are producing of the Hardcover Original Graphic Novel, featuring the retelling of Finn’s
origin. In order to hire the best writers, pencillers, inkers, colourists and
letterers in the business to bring this vision to life, we need your support.
Our plan is to raise the money to be able to hire top-notch creative talent
from the comic and graphic novel field and to partner with an
American Comic Book publisher, Archaia, in order to distribute the graphic novel to comic and bookstores across the world.  
       
Above we see Fiacuil, Finn's warrior mentor and the dreaded, Goll Mc Morna, the man who murders Finn's father, a conflict indeed  ...


Above is Saba Priestess of the underworld and Finn's true love. Saba first comes to Finn in the form of a white deer, cursed so by the dark lord of the underworld. Finn lifts the curse and we see here, Saba transformed back into the beautiful woman she is.
Below is the magical druid Finegas, another wise mentor of Finn's. He teaches Finn the value of the earth and the magic that she holds. Finegas also catches the fames, "Salomon of knowledge."

"You've seen the Movies 'Braveheart', 'Rob Roy', 'Highlander' and recently, the Pixar animation, 'Brave'.  All great and have one thing in common; they're Scottish. The magic, power and beauty that is Irish Story and Myth has seemingly been overlooked by Hollywood and the world, but not any longer - Irish legends and its Heroes deserve a place in our hearts with the graphic novel and up on the Big Screen.
Below we see the Boy Finn's first day of warrior initiation with his wild mentor, Fiacuil.

This ground breaking project will lead the way in the reemergence of the Irish Celtic Warrior Heroes. It will become part of your story, your history, not only for you, but for your ancestors. By honouring them, you honour the past, by honouring the past, you become the hero ...
Below we see Finn's first encounter with the magical druid, Finegas.Together we can forge a new wave of Heroes ... and this time it's IRISH and the Greatest Irish Hero there ever was, Finn McCool. Below we see the moment that Finn is forced to face death, in more ways than one ...     "When you are dust, how will you be remembered?"By supporting this project you will literally create for yourself, and kin, a lasting legacy that you can feel deeply proud of. Part of what the Finn McCool stories stand for, is the mentoring and initiation of our youth. Providing young people with safe, integral and beautiful settings for them to explore their own personal power, while being mentored onto the pathway of adulthood by trustworthy mentor figures. The producer of the Finn McCool Project, supports the Irish Youth Foundation charity. The mission of IYF is to provide opportunities for children and young people facing adverse and extreme conditions to experience success in their lives. A percentage of profits made from the graphic novel of Finn McCool, will be donated to this inspiring charity based in Dublin, Ireland.Below are seven images from Courtney Davis' art pack for this campaign. They are copies of original art from the Finn McCool's story. We are offering these as a part of perk donations. Please view listings on the right hand side of the campaign for more details.               Totally one off and unique ... Should you choose to donate to a perk that comes with a certificate of authenticity, we will do our best to get it to you by Christmas. However, we cannot guarantee the postal system, so we are offering you a downloadable certificate, with your, or the name of the person you are gifting, printed and embossed into the certificate. This will come from our dedicated website, you can then mount or frame the certificate for yourself or a receiver, after all, a part of Irish history is an incredible gift for anyone ...The first wave of funding gets us out into the world with this incredible story, on the Graphic Novel platform. A completed Screenplay for the first film is here, part two is well underway. "A classic in the action adventure genre, and deserves serious studio consideration." But here's the thing, we don't want to just give it away to the big studios, we want to produce as much of the project as possible with the help of public funding. By doing so, we retain as much of the story's authenticity as we can. From the Graphic Novel, to the big screen. You are invited on that wild journey of creation, we want you to be a part of one of the finest stories to have ever come out of Ireland ...         The images that you are seeing are from the talents of John Walters, known for his Stunning VFX on the latest Spartacus series for the US STARZ channel and Courtney Davis, the world's leading Celtic illustrator. Their artwork will become the imagery for the Graphic Novel. John's with the graphic page layout and Courtney's with his incredible Irish knot-work which brings in the magic of the Celtic world. Each page will carry with it Finn McCool's legend. From his true love Saba, cursed into the form of a white deer and freed by Finn from her entrapment, to Saint Patrick, in dialogue with Oisin, Finn's son, or the wild druid, Finegas and the many more characters that I'm sure you will love, and if its "World of Role Play" you're into, we have some fantastic new characters for you to dream alive.What lifts Finn McCool's stories above the crowd?  In truth, reality. Scattered across Ireland are dozens of sacred sites that pre-date the coming of christianity and unlike the make believe world of Tolkien's, "The Hobbit" and "The Lord of The Rings" who dwell on "Middle Earth" (a place that does not exist), the sites across Ireland do.  Many of them include the stories of Finn McCool and the elite bodyguard, the Fianna, protectors of the High Kings of ancient Ireland.     All of the funds will go towards the graphic novel's production, the artwork, writing, lettering, colouring, printing, marketing and distribution. Anything you can offer will help. In return we will offer our deepest gratitude in all kinds of unique perks. Please see the perk bar for details. *Please note: Travel and accommodation expenses are not included and postage outside of the USA must be added if you are claiming a perk that requires postage.What's in a name? There's a very interesting fact about the hero, did you know that there's at least seven different spellings of his name? This has come about over thousands of years, the stories became legends, the legends became myths. Here's the names we know of: Finn McCool ... Fionn Mac Cum Hail ... Finn McCuail ... Fionn McCumhail ... Fyn Mc Cuail ... Fionn McCual ... Finn McCuail. Some say that his name is spelt "Fionn" but that would make it the modern spelling, others say "Finn" the old way. So, what we decided to do was to offer the hero's name so that EVERYBODY can read and pronounce it, an inclusive spelling, hence ... "Finn McCool". Now, for all of the die-hard Gaelic fan's of the hero, we will also be producing a limited edition version, with all of the names, and there are many, spelt in the ancient Irish Gaelic. If that's the copy you'd like, then please just email and let us know. You can do so via this page when you preorder your copy of the graphic novel. What happens if we don't reach our total goal? We will continue the project come what may by STARTING, we can still hire the artists and even begin by creating a soft copy of the stories. We want to invite you to become involved, you are our community, our tribe, we believe that you should have the chance to be a part of this exciting reemergence of the Wild Celt. We'll achieve this through the stories of Finn McCool, and the Fianna.  Finn would have wanted it that way. Real People, Real Project, Real Heart ... YOU.                                      An old Irish saying goes:So, com'on, let's you and I dream the Heroes alive, let's breathe anew the old, give fire to the wind, and call the gods to task. Our time is Now, we honour our past by becoming the hero, by becoming the Hero, we live the myths...For more info on this project please visit these related websites:http://www.Finn-McCool.comhttps://www.facebook.com/FinnMcCoolTheMoviewww.artofjohnwalters.comhttp://www.courtneydavisart.comhttp://www.iyf.ieChris Brosnan is the Writer/Producer of the Finn McCool project. Born in the UK where he lived for 40 years, he now lives in Vancouver, Canada with his wife, Karen  and their 3.7 year old son Fionn.Chris' background is in Film and T.V. production in the UK, as well as writing and performing for the music and stage industry, not only in the UK, but around the world. This has been his passion for over 25 years. Below is a shot of Chris with his son, Fionn, named after the legendary Irish hero Finn McCool ...Speaking of Irish mythology ... it just wouldn't be right without a real Leprechaun ...Chris' writing credits include: "Fugitive Fathers", "Wimps To Warriors", "The Shadow Catcher", "Healers", "Gospel According to Elvis", "The Redemption of Man" and "Finn McCool - The Forging of the Fianna." Graphic novel and the feature film screenplay of the same."I was first introduced to the legends of Finn McCool from my Grandmother and later from traditional storytellers. His legend has fascinated, not only me, but the people of Ireland and scholars alike the world over for centuries." Chris started his film career working alongside the likes of Clint Eastwood, Ron Howard, Kevin Costner and Morgan Freeman, in big budget feature films, learning from the best in movies such as: "Willow", "Robin Hood - Prince of Thieves", "White Hunter- Black Heart", "Batman", and many, many more.Although Chris started his career as an actor, he found that he preferred the other side of the camera. He became a writer/producer for stage in the early nineties and has also worked on productions for the BBC as well as many Independents.The natural progression into producing is something Chris is very focussed on, and his passion and energy is on breathing life into this exiting new project.Chris brings a wealth of experience in the industry, and an extensive book of contacts to the Finn McCool project.If you are unable to donate, then you can still help us by spreading the word of our campaign to those around you, via Facebook, Twitter, Youtube, emails to friends, contacts and importantly by using the Indiegogo share button at the very top of this page ... YOU CAN MAKE A DIFFERENCE and remember that there's a blessings of magic and luck with every Irish story, so claim yours by supporting the heroes of old.We will be updating the page as the campaign moves forward with new artwork and news, so keep in touch, send us your blessings, as we do to you ...May you be blessed in all ways, always ...

story:
About us Comic Cartel 

Hello All, 

Gabriel Hernandez Creator and writer of Coywolf series along with co-writer, Artist, Illustrator and Dallas Cowboys very own Robert Arista. We are excited to bring a new comic series about a young Native Afro Latina super hero who fights crime along side the Mexican border in Nogales, Arizona. Follow Canelita as she fights the Cartel and corrupt police along a mystic border town. Canelita discovers super human strength handed down from her Native American ancestors and her spirit animal the Coywolf. We have multiple stories written as this one is completed and will release in late March. Stay tuned for 2nd comic and follow up Coywolf "Border on Fire" to be released later this year.

What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking backing of this comic to cover publishing cost and printing cost. Backers will receive a signed comic and additional perks displayed in campaign. We are also offering original art sketched art by Bert Arista see campaign for details. We are 1st time comic creators so be advised as you will want to be part of something new and exciting and hand signed by us before this goes viral or published.

Your Impact

We feel its necessary to give all ethic backgrounds a voice during these challenging times as our character Canelita will be a strong voice for ages to come. 

  • Thank you all for your early contributions please follow coywolf.com to be released soon.
  • We will have t-shirts, Mugs, Posters, Pins, and original art.
  • The Project is finished and as stated will be shipping in March or when campaign ends.

Risks & Challenges

We have a had a few challenges in the past as some of you have followed me. Rest assure as our new Artist Robert Arista is on point and is nothing but Fire!

  • We have no hurdles at this time as we are past that point!
  • The Challenge is ourselves as we look in the mirror everyday. The question is are we doing enough to support each other? 

Other Ways You Can Help

We will take donations in the smallest amount please leave your information as you may get a surprise in the mail or email. We also plan to donate copies to schools or colleges depending on age limitations. 

  • We ask that you share with friends and family and social media to get the word out. 
  • Click on links and don't forget to text, email, or post. Also like us on Youtube and search Coywolf comic or Comic Cartel. 

Thank you all from the bottom of our hearts.

About us Comic Cartel 
Hello All, 
Gabriel Hernandez Creator and writer of Coywolf series along with co-writer, Artist, Illustrator and Dallas Cowboys very own Robert Arista. We are excited to bring a new comic series about a young Native Afro Latina super hero who fights crime along side the Mexican border in Nogales, Arizona. Follow Canelita as she fights the Cartel and corrupt police along a mystic border town. Canelita discovers super human strength handed down from her Native American ancestors and her spirit animal the Coywolf. We have multiple stories written as this one is completed and will release in late March. Stay tuned for 2nd comic and follow up Coywolf "Border on Fire" to be released later this year.

What We Need & What You Get
We are seeking backing of this comic to cover publishing cost and printing cost. Backers will receive a signed comic and additional perks displayed in campaign. We are also offering original art sketched art by Bert Arista see campaign for details. We are 1st time comic creators so be advised as you will want to be part of something new and exciting and hand signed by us before this goes viral or published.

Your Impact
We feel its necessary to give all ethic backgrounds a voice during these challenging times as our character Canelita will be a strong voice for ages to come. 

Thank you all for your early contributions please follow coywolf.com to be released soon.
We will have t-shirts, Mugs, Posters, Pins, and original art.
The Project is finished and as stated will be shipping in March or when campaign ends.


Risks & Challenges
We have a had a few challenges in the past as some of you have followed me. Rest assure as our new Artist Robert Arista is on point and is nothing but Fire!

We have no hurdles at this time as we are past that point!
The Challenge is ourselves as we look in the mirror everyday. The question is are we doing enough to support each other? 


Other Ways You Can Help
We will take donations in the smallest amount please leave your information as you may get a surprise in the mail or email. We also plan to donate copies to schools or colleges depending on age limitations. 

We ask that you share with friends and family and social media to get the word out. 
Click on links and don't forget to text, email, or post. Also like us on Youtube and search Coywolf comic or Comic Cartel. 

Thank you all from the bottom of our hearts.

story:
The series follows the adventures of an elite guardian force/militia group called FireFang and their journey throughout a world known as PowerLand. After being instrumental in defeating the evil King Don Anomaly and his regime during the Anomaly-Nexus War several hundred years ago, these group of immortal champions are called to deal with a new threat within the country of Kuru. The success of their mission will be dependent on how they deal with the challenge that lies ahead. Upon doing so, others will join their movement and serve as defenders of their respective countries. As a global organization, FireFang is at the service of the oppressed in the name of Freedom. 
 
 
 

Name: Celes Lina Goodman

Alias: Queen Lina Izdubar, The Dreamer

Age: 1062

Birthplace: New Delhi, India

Occupation: Queen of Kuru

Bio: Once a prisoner aboard a giant ship known as Lainhardt Omega in another universe, along with her mother, Zahra Melech-Goodman. After a failed coup against the powers that be in Lainhardt Omega, Celes and her co-conspirators were sentenced to death by airlock ejection. Due to coming in contact with a cosmic substance known as Dark Matter during an experiment years ago, her body underwent a slow change. Consequently, Celes' latent reality warping powers emerged along with receiving an exponential boost to her current psychokinetic abilities. This power boost with new found abilities ultimately saved Celes and her friends from certain doom. Using her reality warping power, all of them were transported safely to a world they now call PowerLand.

 

Name: Zini Artemis Goodman (Formerly Zini Emuqa Anomaly)

Alias: Stardust Girl, Stardust Dragon (As Star Anomaly)

Age: 728

Birthplace: Caprice, Ancient Isles

Occupation: Soldier

Bio: Born to King Don and Crystal Anomaly, tyrants responsible for starting the Anomaly-Nexus War, Zini witnessed firsthand of their evil, living under their rule. In the society in which she lived, the Anomaly Race as a people were hostile towards non super-powered beings. Knowing that she too fit the latter label as a kid, Zini became a target of their ridicule. Furthermore, decerning that her emerging psychokinetic power in her mid-teens would make her more hated, Zini kept its existence private. She, however, would soon find a better use for her emerging talents as a member of FireFang.

Name: Mackie Diana Nexus

Alias: Queen Mackie, Lady Diana

Age: 720

Birthplace: Dragora, Ancient Isles

Occupation: Princess of the Nexus

Bio: As firstborn, Mackie's ascension to being the Queen was sure. Her accomplishments on the battlefield and throughout Dragora won the hearts of the people. Things would take a turn for the worse after the assassination of her entire family, with the exception of her sister, Kita. Mackie and Kita later joined Andrew's FireFang to get justice for their family and soon become the new leaders of the Nexus Race. To better serve her people, Mackie believed traveling with FireFang was the best choice for her and Kita rather than being in the throne room.

Name: Kita Sade Mokumura

Alias: Knuckle K.

Age: 718

Birthplace: Dragora, Ancient Isles

Occupation: Princess of the Nexus

Bio: Though she is the youngest member of FireFang, Kita has earned her place among her comrades not just a fellow soldier, but also as a beloved princess among the Nexus Race. On the battlefield, Kita's diamond super-powered gloves are a force to recon. The people of Powerland recognize Kita as being the most philanthropic of FireFang, using her finances to help the poor in every town they visit.

Name: Glen Alexander Edwards

Alias: Hurricane Zeno (As Zeno Anomaly), Kas (Post Anomaly-Nexus War)

Age: 725

Birthplace: Roanoke, USA

Occupation: Adventurer

Bio: Born to an aristocratic family in the city of Roanoke. Glen and his fellow humans are the first to arrive in PowerLand, all of which instances were through various mysterious circumstances. Glen spent his time exploring this vast new world, eventually becoming good friends with Andrew, Kita, and Mackie before the war started. Unbeknownst to humans, their existence would spark the beginning of the Anomaly-Nexus War. Fearing for their lives, Roanoke, in conjunction with a handful of other human-only cities, signed legislature forbidding their citizens from leaving their cities as isolationist city-states. Furthermore, all foreigners would be met with hostility and exiled from human owned towns. These laws, though, didn't stop Glen and his adventurous spirit. As a result of his rebelliousness, Roanoke’s leaders exiled him from their city. Glen soon met Zini, a fellow exile, and together with Andrew, Kita, and Mackie, stood against the genocidal Anomaly Regime.

Name: Andrew Zack Rayne II

Alias: Grandmaster Reign II, Andy

Age: 719

Birthplace: Destiny, Ancient Isles

Occupation: Monk, Inventor

Bio: Son of Andrew Rayne I, AKA: Grandmaster Reign I. Aspiring to be like his father by joining the Ancient Power Council was his life long goal. This all came to an end when assassins from the Anomaly Regime killed Queen Miranda Nexus and the entire Ancient Power Council, including Andrew's father. Without the wise men and Queen Nexus leading the way, the Nexus people were lost. It took a leap of faith for them to trust the young Andrew II and his FireFang. At the time, FireFang consisted of himself, his future wife, Kita, and future queen of the Nexus people, Mackie. Andrew was always known to lead, even in technological breakthroughs. One being the Diamond Power Forging (DPF) technology that combined the diamond mineral with the cosmic element, Dark Matter, for extraordinary effects. As the leader of FireFang, Andrew's leadership skills in this small militia group, all armed with the revolutionary DPF weaponry, turned the tide of the Anomaly-Nexus War. All of this was done also with the help of Zini and Celes, thus paving the way for a better future so newer generations could prosper. Centuries since then, FireFang kept their vow in protecting the people from any and all threats lurking within PowerLand. As for his patented DPF, many developed nations across the planet run factories and power plants using it in modern times.

Othello Gooden Jr.: Creator

Creator of the Travelers' Frontier Multiverse. Published author of 3 books on Amazon. Is also an animator and composer. Most notable works are the Memoire de Rayloria Vlog Series, Stop Motion Car Show, and the Super Mecha Madness Show. Known as JG the Traveler/JGTraveler on the indie music scene. Music is featured on mixtapes and in other various productions over the years. Is currently #1 on Reverbnation in Cincinnati, Ohio under EDM Artists.

Juryan Goode: Co-Creator

Creator of several other groups and concepts in PowerLand, including but not limited to FireFang. On the indie music scene, he is known as the Legendary MC, Zaxk Burner, and one of best artists and producers out there in the East Coast. At 21, Zaxk topped the music charts as #1 on May 8, 2014 on N1M, with nearly over 1,000 fans on Reverbnation. He is also known as the King of Dubstep, the King of Trap, & the King of Indie Music for his numerous of chart topping singles like "Meditation" & "Stardust Dragon".

Vanessa Nunez: Writer

Current Graduate student studying English Composition and Literature seeking to develop and improve through my love and passion of writing academic and creatively. Graduated with a BA in English, Creative Writing, and Media/Cultural Studies. Has 2+ years experience of pop culture journalism and have written for Akibento, Fandom, and The Black Sheep. Alongside writing about film, gaming, and literature, have several years experience writing academically on literature. Currently working freelance jobs to gain experience in various styles of writing as well as support her academics.

Angeli Benipayo - Illustrator

Professional soprano with years of experience in operatic and classical singing. Can sing in different languages, namely Italian, German, French, Spanish, English and Filipino. I have done some operatic roles in Italian, German and English operas, and have concertized actively both in and out of her country. VOCAL SKILLS: - can sing any genre - can sing any piece with vocal range of D4-G6 - can record voice overs, jingles and podcasts - can write/co-write songs CAN ALSO  - draw manga, both colored and/or black and white!

He is also known as the King of Dubstep, the King of Trap, & the King of Indie Music for his numerous of chart topping singles like "Meditation" & "Stardust Dragon".

Vanessa Nunez: Writer
Current Graduate student studying English Composition and Literature seeking to develop and improve through my love and passion of writing academic and creatively. Graduated with a BA in English, Creative Writing, and Media/Cultural Studies. Has 2+ years experience of pop culture journalism and have written for Akibento, Fandom, and The Black Sheep. Alongside writing about film, gaming, and literature, have several years experience writing academically on literature. Currently working freelance jobs to gain experience in various styles of writing as well as support her academics.

Angeli Benipayo - Illustrator
Professional soprano with years of experience in operatic and classical singing. Can sing in different languages, namely Italian, German, French, Spanish, English and Filipino. I have done some operatic roles in Italian, German and English operas, and have concertized actively both in and out of her country. VOCAL SKILLS: - can sing any genre - can sing any piece with vocal range of D4-G6 - can record voice overs, jingles and podcasts - can write/co-write songs CAN ALSO  - draw manga, both colored and/or black and white!

story:
MASTERS OF THE COSMOS is a project by Niko Popov - produced by Grozen Ent.

Bulgarian comic novel in one volume with seven fantastic episodes! The Author and Artist of the project is Nikolay Popov – Niko.

THE SOUNDTRACK: Made by Chiwawa & Eleven Other Bands, selected in National Music Contest.

THE STORY: `Two aliens. One goal. Planet Earth... Sounds easy - doesn't it? But only on paper!... Follow the briliantly stupid and funny other-planetary beings and their "flawless" plans for domination over the small blue planet, we humans call "Our Home"! ... Will it remain Ours? Or will we be forced to work in the gold mines in name of Our new masters? ... You can find out only here...`

APPROPRIATE FOR KIDS :)

DESCRIPTION:  A4 format, 80 pages. With the volume comes a CD with soundtrack and music video from the comics. Bound in hardcover, trilingual - in three circulations - in English, French and Bulgarian. It will be available for iPhone, iPad and iPod in Grozen Ent.`s App Store: quadrilingual - in English, French, German and Bulgarian.

BUDGET

This budget is made to cover all the print costs, CD recording and printing, creation and basic sending of all the items, and of course - the author salary.

                                       COMICS PREVIEW

                                             THE REWARDS!

If you have pledged to get the book, add this reward to get a small drawing in your dedication :)

AWESOME Branded Bag (42x38x0,2cm) & THANK YOU Rock (with personal `Thanks` from the author)

PDF of the book (digitally sent)

Original Ceramic CUP, 330 ml - printed with art from the book. + 3 Colored Badges-Package with graphics from the comics.

Original T-shirt with graphics from the comics. + 3 Colored Badges-Package with graphics from the comics. + Signed Poster A2 (42х60cm)

[INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING INCLUDED] The printed BOOK, 80 pages, full color, hard cover, 21 X 29cm + Personal dedication written and signed by the author.

SUPER BIG Signed Poster. BO (1414X1000mm)

The printed BOOK+CD inside, 80 pages, full color, hard cover, 21X29cm + Personal dedication written and signed by the author. + Signed Poster A2(42х60cm)

 

Signed BOOK + PRINT ONLY SPECIAL: MAKING OF + Original CUP + Original T-shirt + Signed Poster A2 (42х60cm)

Signed Book + PRINT ONLY SPECIAL: MAKING OF + 2 Original CUPS + Original T-shirt + 3 Colored Badges-Package + Signed Poster A2 (42х60cm)


Signed BOOK + PRINT ONLY SPECIAL: MAKING OF + LIMITED EDITION OF HAND MADE MINIATURE: Resin Sculpture, fully colored and mounted of the two MASTERS characters. Size: 10 cm Artist: Sybilla Koritareva

Signed BOOK + PRINT ONLY SPECIAL: MAKING OF + HAND MADE MINIATURE + Original CUP + 3 Colored Badges-Package + Signed Poster A2 (42х60cm)

 

    Help us financially and let us present you with our production                                                                in return :)

                                             Thank You!

story:
The Speil

GART is a regualrly updated webcomic about a half-goblin-half-imp set on bringing down the Goblin King Gobbo with his group of whimsicle mates. (avaible to read at http://gartcomic.co.uk) And it's fast reaching it's exciting conclusion.
 
The only catch is, ONLINE PUBICATION WILL NOW CEASE. The only way you can find out what happens in by funding the book!
 
The GART graphic novel will be 120+ pages and will include both full colour and b/w pages, full colour illustration, extra comic strips, design sketches etc.

What We Need & What You Get

Printing cost for this book is around $700 (or £450) for a limited run of 100. However if the target is exceeded I'll extend the print run for more people to enjoy!
 
The more the give, the more you get. I'll be offering badges, prints, zines, sketches and more to those of you who want to get involed! Even the odd T-shirt here and there. And of course a copy of the book itself.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word! Ask others to donate to my first ever graphic novel!
 
Tweet me @ANASEED_MAN
Tumbl me http://anaseed.tumblr.com
 
And most importatly, get people reading GART so they'll be encoureged to see the ending!!

story:
OUR STORY

THIEVES of EDEN is a graphic novel thriller to SAVE REALITY from ENEMIES of LIFE!  This high concept story exploded into comic life when I met artist Chris Hopkins. Adapted from my fiction thriller book, Issue #1 is now available at www.thievesofeden.com, where you can also see a free teaser.  We hope you'll want to subscribe too!

We ignite curiosity with humor, beautiful characters, outrageous art and wild story twists.  Are there really "ENEMIES of LIFE"?  Is REALITY itself in danger?


THE PLOT

Awareness becomes action that unites people and purpose as four characters meet and discover they are a game – THE GAME – for the very life of our planet.  Their opponents, with a 6,000 year advantage, are about to trigger Earth’s end (for perfectly good business reasons!) with a final environmental death clench as their game-winning move.

To quickly stop these Enemies of Life, the four must cooperate and find rare knowledge closely guarded by elders in their respective sacred traditions. 

Battling powerful forces of evil they must connect ancient wisdom puzzles with cutting-edge science to form an unusual energy device, the source of unexplained “miracles” hidden to all but an elite few throughout history.

Who blocked this knowledge and why?

OUR PURPOSE

This “who done it mystery” unveils a story that connects new sciences like bio-physics (how human energy fields operate as cellphones!) and rare knowledge from my personal trainings with authentic Native American Medicine Men, Chinese Qigong (Energy) Masters and other amazing lineage holders of genuine wisdom traditions. 

The great privilege of training for many years comes with a real responsibility to share what I've been given.  I'm told my gift is communicating this knowledge in ways that easily integrate science, wisdom, spirituality, energy and physiology into practical stuff.

My goal is to usher in a WISDOM tsunami with big fun!  From ancient to futuristic, rare knowledge is now needed to illuminate the treasures of different cultures, traditions and peoples that can possibly win THE GAME. 

What if... pollution, environmental collapse, financial frenzies, political obstruction, privacy and more are all connected?  If so, what are the real motives?  Who controls them?  What can people do against such powerful forces?  

In other words, is THE GAME for the very life of our planet REAL?!?  If so, on which side are YOU?  Awake or asleep? 

How do you PLAY?  And WIN?

THIEVES of EDEN is multi-dimensional.  It grows understanding beyond the commonplace, like going from dial-up to broadband awareness.  Its story, content and plot are designed to uplift lives, open hearts and deepen minds – so that we can make better sense of life and improve our shared reality. 

"THINK PRANKS" - SAVE REALITY CAMPAIGNS

As a comic book for progressives, and as a low-budget alternative to think tanks, we added an exciting new venue - a 

"comic within the comic" that our main character reads.  We'll utilize this to enliven today's issues with mind-opening humor that untwists reality from outrageous absurdity and non-stop spin.   Check out our first campaign at: 

http://thievesofeden.com/?page_id=439


MY BACKGROUND

As a psychophysiologist, stress specialist, corporate wellness trainer and ENERGY HEALTH/Qigong Instructor, I learned you can write books and lecture until you're totally blue.  But to reach people with fresh creativity, the entertainment media and the comic format provide mo' better potential plus way more fun!

I noticed that much of the entertainment world, perhaps in sync with the “real” world, has darkened in plot, horror, gruesomeness and cruelty, sometimes with brilliance.

But... are the amazing possibilities of humans living in a quantum reality being squashed?  How about higher consciousness as a super power!?!

So... we're bringing back WISDOM, as best we can.  

Since SAVING REALITY is at present a non-union job with no pension plan or healthcare, we could greatly use your support to keep it going.  We've successfully produced Issue #1, a cool website, a fun video and the actual book. 

FUNDING GOALS

With your help we can use these funding levels:

$20,000 complete the entire graphic novel series in digital form

$40,000 plus print physical comics as we go

$60,000 also make motion comics of each issue as we go

All funds we get will go right into making all the issues we can.   

YOUR PERKS!

We are happy to thank you with annual subscriptions, signed posters of our Issue #1 cover, our awesome THIEVES of EDEN logo on black cotton T-shirts, black cotton hoodies and coffee mugs.  Plus we are thrilled to offer you beautiful, hand-drawn, signed collectible art by graphic artist Chris Hopkins, from page size to life-sized character sketches in black and white ink and full color! 

YOUR IMPACT

The characters are now clamouring for me to write the sequel.  It will be wonderful to have the luxurious joy of full focus with a growing fan base!  We'll LOVE you for spreading the word about THIEVES of EDEN.  Indiegogo has share tools just for that. 

Big thanks to YOU!

story:
The Gist

My Super Bowl Commercial


Hello, you beautiful soul. As the video states, my birthday is coming up. The big 3-0. I can't believe it either. While I know it is tradition to send the birthday person into a drunken stupor, my preference is to remember the night and the great people that were there. Consequently, my suggestion is to swap that $10-12 drink with a $1-5 donation to a good cause: seeing your boy progress towards his dream, starting with improv classes at a world-famous school. 

I created this campaign with the idea that if LESS THAN HALF of my Facebook friends each gave ONE dollar, we would generate enough to achieve both these goals. 


The Birthday Present

Though Groundlings has several levels that cost a pretty penny, I am setting my intentions on one grand 30th birthday gift: tuition to the first level of Groundlings. 

  • Basic Core Level: $500
In addition to developing my comedy on the stage, I'm also looking to get the ball rolling with some comedy in your headphones. I have a few podcast ideas in development and am looking to get Lift Off with quality sounds equipment. While there is additional equipment needed, I added the big ticket items to the bigger fundraising goal (plus a bit more to factor in fees). 
  • (1) USB Audio Interface: $150
  • (2) XLR Microphones: $150
If 800 people give a dollar, this is totally feasible. However, it'd be much easier to inspire 400 people to give two dollars. That $2 is way cheaper than an $8 beer. LET'S BELIEVE!

The Impact

My vision to become a source of joy for the world. I grew up watching my favorite funny people like Adam Sandler, Jim Carey, and more; adoring my favorite stories like The Sandlot and Little Giants; memorizing obscure lines like "We're not the nothings from no where... we're the Elma Nothings." 

My movies became a weekend ritual. They transported me to other worlds, and continue to be a great escape. 

As I got older, and depression became a growing battle, I turned to my favorites, led by The Office. It is because of this dynamic that I formulated my vision. I want to create and/or be a part of entertainment that allows people to take a breath from their pain and enjoy a hardy laugh. In doing so, in being that source of laughter for others, I too will be able to escape my own pain. 


The Conclusion

I could never forget the kindness that people have shown me. No matter what - no matter the distance or the time - I remain indebted to those who have helped and continue to support me and my dreams. Those that pitch in on the "party" will never be forgotten. This may all sound way too serious/dramatic/deep. It could be just $1-$5 that you give, but I know what message is sent behind the currency. Even if you don't say it... I know you mean it in your heart....

You're so sweet.
